Preparation: *Hibiscus Simple Syrup: 1:1 w/ a cup of dried hibiscus steeping for 30-40 min
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, 1 oz Hibiscus Simple Syrup, 0.5 oz Lime Juice, 1 top Soda Water

Preparation: *House-made Cranberry syrup:  -- 2 cups Fresh Cranberries -- 1 cup Sugar -- 1 cup Water -- 2 Bay Leaves -- .25 cup Pink Peppercorns -- Half Serrano Chile -- 4 Sprigs Fresh Rosemary  Add all ingredients to a pot and heat thoroughly. Simmer on low until cranberries cook down for 25 minutes. Strain and let cool.
Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz House-made Cranberry Syrup, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Cranberry Juice, .25 oz Lillet Blanc, 4 dash Forgery Earth Day Bitters, 1 mist Laphroaig
Garnish: Dehydrated Lemon Wheel, Sprig of Rosemary

Preparation: *Pineapple Gomme:  Mix equal parts (1.5 cups) gum arabic with water over high heat until it all mixes and then let cool for a bit. Then you're gonna make a sugar syrup with 2 parts sugar, 1 part water (4 cups water, 2 cups white granulated sugar) in the same manner over high heat until it mixes, and then add the gum syrup to the mix until everything dissolves and what you're left with is a thick gummy syrup that resembles a whole lot of baby batter. Then cut up 1.5 cups of pineapple chunks, put in mason jar, and pour the gum syrup over it and let it sit in the refrigerator over night. A few hours would work also if you don't have that much time. However, the more time, the more pineapple infusion takes place. When it's ready, strain into another mason jar or bottle, and it's ready to go.
Ingredients: 1500 ml BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 750 ml Lemon Juice, 750 ml Pineapple Gomme Syrup, .5 oz Fee Bros Lemon Bitters, 1 float Old Vine Zin

Preparation: *Pineapple Syrup: Equal parts pineapple blended with water and sugar and strained
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz St. Germain, .25 oz Pineapple Syrup, 1 bsp Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure

Preparation: 1st glass ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino, Acid Phosphate  2nd glass ingredients: BarSol Quebranta Pisco, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Luxardo Fernet, Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 4 drops Acid phosphate, 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Luxardo Fernet, 3 dash Scrappy's Aromatic Bitters

Preparation: Add 6-8 sugar snap peas to cocktail shaker. Lightly muddle the peas. Add all other ingredients except for the tonic. Shake and double strain into a collins glass. Top with tonic.   *House-made Simple Syrup:  -- 1 cup Sugar -- 1 cup Water  Add equal parts sugar and water into a small saucepan, bring to a boil; simmer until the sugar is dissolved, approximately 3 minutes. Remove from heat, let cool to room temperature and transfer to a clean glass jar. Cover and keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz House-made Simple Syrup, 1 oz Manzanilla Sherry, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 2 dash Absinthe, 8 Sugar Snap Peas, 1 top Tonic

Preparation: Add all ingredients and dry-shake (without ice), then add ice, and shake again. Strain into coupe and garnish with rhubarb bitters.
Ingredients: 2 oz Bourbon, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, .5 oz Egg White

Preparation: Add all ingredients except beer into shaker tin, shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Add beer in shaker tin then double strain into tin cup. Add mint for garish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Pure Cane Simple Syrup, 2 count Deschutes Fresh Squeezed IPA

Preparation: Add all ingredients except the champagne to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Fill with champagne and garnish with a flamed orange peel.
Ingredients: .75 oz Cognac, .5 oz Cointreau, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .25 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 3 oz Champagne

Cocktail Name: King's Snap the Chocolate Out of You
Preparation: Add all ingredients except the whip cream and ginger snap. Shake and double into a rocks glass with no ice. Top with marshmallow whip cream. Garnish with Ginger snap crumbles.
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1.5 oz Homemade milk chocolate, .75 oz Hazelnut Cinnamon syrup, 0.75 oz Marshmallow whip cream, 0.75 oz Ginger snaps

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker, shake, fine strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass. Garnish with edible flower.  *Jasmine Tea/Rice-Infused Junipero Gin: -- 1 bottle (750ml) Junípero gin -- .5 cup Jasmine Tea -- .5 cup Jasmine Rice (wash rice to eliminate starch)  Sous Vide Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. Fill container with hot water. Set sous vide at 52c. Add vacuum seal bag with jasmine tea/rice in bath. Let sit in bath for 45 minutes. Take the bag out of bath and sit it in ice bath for 15 minutes. Open bag and fine strain back into bottle.  Infusion Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. In a cambro/mason jar, add Junípero gin and jasmine tea and rice. Let infuse for 24 hours. Fine strain into bottle.  **House-made Honey Syrup:   Put equal parts of honey (10 oz) and water (10 oz) in a saucepan. Boil, then turn down to a simmer and stir until the honey is completely dissolved.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Jasmine Tea/Rice-Infused Junipero Gin*, .75 oz Leopold Bros. Sour Apple Liqueur, .75 oz Lime, .5 oz House-made Honey Syrup, .25 oz Lo-Fi Gentian Amaro

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain into a Nick & Nora coupe. Garnish with a ghost orange twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .25 oz Luxardo Espresso Italian Liqueur, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 2 dash Salted Chocolate Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with lime pinwheel and bing cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Monin Strawberry Puree, 7 Mint Leaves, .5 oz Lemon Sour, 1 oz Lemon Lime Soda

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with lime pinwheel and bing cherry.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1  Basil Leaf, .25 oz Lime Juice, 5 dash Rose Water

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with orange slice and 1 bar spoon juniper berries.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Lime Sour, .5 oz Orange Juice, .25 oz Dry Curacao

Preparation: Add all ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain over fresh ice. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Monin Apple Puree, .25 oz Lemon Juice, 1 dash Fennel Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients in mixing glass, stir and strain over 2x2 ice cube in smoked glass on hickory board. Garnish with orange peel and clothes pin.
Ingredients: .75 oz Banks 5 Rum, .75 oz Denizen Aged White Rum , .75 oz Denizen Aged White Rum , .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and double strain into a glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz H by HINE, .25 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Fee Brothers Rhubard bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a punch bowl or pitcher and stir. Add lemon wheels and strawberries to garnish.
Ingredients: 25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 37.5 oz Cranberry Juice, 37.5 oz Fever-Tree Lemonade

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a punch bowl. Serve in small rocks glasses.
Ingredients: .75 c Junipero Gin, .75 c C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 c Lemon Juice, .5 c Ginger-Vanilla Syrup, 4 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 bottle Sparkling Rose
Garnish: Cinnamon sticks, Lemon wheels, Apple slices

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice, shake furiously. Fine strain into chilled coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Luxardo Fernet, .25 oz BenRiach Curiositas Single Malt 10 YO, .75 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake. Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with star anise and two slices lemongrass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Osha Falernum, .5 oz Lemon juice, 1 oz Pineapple juice, 3 dash Orange bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients into a shaker, shake strain into a collins glass, fill with crushed ice, garnish with mint leaves.
Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Lemon, Elder Flower Liquor, Honey Syrup, Carrot Juice

Preparation: Add all ingredients into shaking tin. Add ice cubes to tin. Shake vigorously and strain into coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice

Preparation: Add all ingredients over ice. Stir with a barspoon. Squeeze lemon wedges and add blackberries.
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Briottet Creme de Mure (Blackberry), 1 top Pear Cider

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 seconds. Strain into a highball filled with fresh ice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Honey Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until cold and strain into a chilled coupe.
Ingredients: 2 oz Single Malt Scotch, .25 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Add ice and integration shake. Pour over fresh ice into a highball and top with California Lager. Garnish with a half orange wheel.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Orange Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 1 top Anchor California Lager
Notes: First served at Tales of the Cocktail 2014 "Luxardo CAP Lunch"

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass. Stir until thoroughly chilled (~30 seconds). Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve with one big rock. Garnish with an expressed orange swath.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Junmai Sake, .25 oz Coconut Rum, 1 dash Orange Bitters, 1 dash Coconut Vinegar

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into chilled stemmed cordial glass. Garnish with cocktail cherry and lemon twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Dubonnet Rouge, .5 oz Cherry Herring, .375 oz Blood Orange Juice, .375 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Combine ingredients in an ice-filled mixing glass and stir for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Old Tom Gin, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 dash Orange Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake well without ice to emulsify the egg white. Add ice and shake hard until the drink is chilled. Strain through a fine-mesh strainer into a chilled coupe and garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .75 oz Pineapple Juice, .75 oz Fresh Egg White, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Notes: Cocktail appeared in IMBIBE EVENTS + PROMOTIONS PIG N PUNCH JUNE 15, 2016

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice, then double strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a celery leaf.
Ingredients: 1 oz Broker's Gin, 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Celery Root Puree, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Simple Syrup, 3 dash Apple Bitters, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Add all ingredients to a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Simple Syrup

Preparation: Add all ingredients to blender and blend throughly. Double strain into a glass with cracked ice garnish with a mint sprig and fresh grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, 1.5 oz Fresh Passion Fruit, 1 oz Condense Milk, .25 oz Brown Sugar Syrup (2:1)

Preparation: Add all ingredients to tin and dry shake. Add ice and vigorously shake for 12 seconds. Fine strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish by sprinkling matcha powder (.25 tsp).   *Rich Simple Syrup:  -- 2 cups Granulated Sugar -- 1 cup Water  Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat, let cool to room temperature and transfer to a clean glass jar. Cover and keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.
Ingredients: .75 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Egg White, .5 oz Rich Simple Syrup

Preparation: Add all ingredients together.
Ingredients: 1 oz High West Oat Whisky, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Peach Shrub, .75 oz Lime, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Grapefruit Bitters
Notes: Featured on the Padrecito cocktail menu august (fall) 2015

Preparation: Add all liquid ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice filled white wine glass. Garnish by adding pineapple chunks and Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 2 oz Pineapple Juice, 1 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 1 oz Simple Syrup
Notes: The original SF Pisco Punch recipe from the 1800s is made with a pisco from Italia grapes known as “Rosa del Peru”.

Preparation: Add all of the ingredients, except seeds, to a shaker with ice and shake well. Double strain onto fresh ice into a collins glass. Garnish with 1 spoon of passion fruit seeds.  *Pilon Syrup: Homemade 50/50 simple syrup using Pilon Sugar made from Mexican Sugar Cane.
Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, 1.5 oz Sweetened Condensed Milk, 1 oz Passion Fruit (fresh or puree), .5 oz Pilon Syrup

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir until well chilled and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso
Notes: Photo credit: Tim Turner (The Modern Mixologist: Contemporary Classic Cocktails)

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 3 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange peel.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Applejack, 1 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Gin, .75 oz Sweet Vermouth, .75 oz Dubonnet Rouge, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into a small wine or cocktail glass. Twist a slice of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Gin, 1.5 oz Pineau des Charentes, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir, and strain into an old fashioned glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry and an orange slice or twist.
Ingredients: 2 oz Bourbon, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe glass filled with crushed ice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Banks 5 Island Rum, .75 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 tsp Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure

Preparation: Add all the ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice. Shake, and strain into a coupe glass.  *Pineapple-Infused Mezcal: Peel, core and chop a whole pineapple into 1-inch cubes. Add to a large jar or other container with a lid, and add a 750-mL bottle of mezcal. Let stand for 5 days and strain before using.
Ingredients: .75 oz Pineapple-Infused Mezcal, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Add cognac, amaro, lemon, strawberry syrup and fresh cracked egg white of a whole egg to tin. Dry shake without ice approx. 5 seconds to emulsify. Add ice and shake hard again approx. 10 seconds. Fine strain into coupe. Crack drag black pepper over surface. Serve and enjoy.  *Strawberry syrup- 1 cup fresh strawberries 1 cup water 1cup sugar. Blend in vitamix then heat on stove and stir until hot to bind sugars, don't boil. Bottle and refrigerate.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Strawberry Syrup, .5 oz Egg White

Preparation: Add cognac, rye, Chartreuse and bitters to a mixing glass with ice, and stir until cold. Add splash of fernet to a rocks glass, roll the glass to coat the sides, and discard the excess. Add one large ice cube to the glass, strain the drink over the cube, and garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Rye Whiskey, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, 2 dash Lemon Bitters, 1 splash Fernet-Branca

Preparation: Add cubed ice to a highball, add 2 dashes of Angostura Bitters, top with ginger beer, garnish with a sprig of basil.
Ingredients: 40 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 top Ginger Beer

Preparation: Add first three ingredients to a mixing glass with shaker and lightly shake with ice. Pour mixture into a Collins or highball glass over ice. Top with Mexican Coke (or any coca cola as a substitute) and pour Luxardo Fernet on top to float. Garnish with a lime wheel and fresh mint sprig.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1.5 oz Fresh lime juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, Mexican Coca Cola, 1 float Luxardo Fernet

Preparation: Add gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and liqueur de violette to a collins glass filled with ice. Add tonic water; stir to combine. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .25 oz Liqueur de Violette, 4 oz Tonic Water

Preparation: Add ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon peel to fit in glass and 1 dash of Abbott's Aromatic Bitters. Optional sugar rim.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .25 oz Dry Curacao, .5 oz Bourbon Rye, .25 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Add ingredients to a mixing glass except club soda. Shake over ice, strain over ice into a collins glass, top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge and candied ginger on a pick.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup, 2 oz Club soda

Preparation: Add ingredients to a mug and stir.  *Honey-Ginger Syrup: Combine 1 part ginger with 2 parts honey and 1 cup of water and boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Strain and discard solids.  **Ghost-Pepper-Infused Campari: Soak 1 ghost pepper in a 16 oz. bottle of Campari for up to 24 hrs (reduce infusion time to reduce heat).  ***Cinnamon Tincture: Soak 3 cinnamon sticks in 16 oz. of any neutral grain alcohol that is high proof (regular 80-proof vodka is great) for up to 14 days. Strain and discard the sticks.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 2 oz Cold-pressed Apple Cider, 2 oz Hot Water, .5 oz Honey-Ginger Syrup, 1 tsp Ghost-Pepper-Infused Campari, 3 dash Cinnamon Tincture

Preparation: Add Junipero Gin and botanicals first. Add ice and follow with a bold tonic. Top with additional botanicals/garnish for presentation.  *Assorted Complementing Botanicals: Orange, Star Anise, Rose Petals, Italian Juniper
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 2 oz East Imperial Superior Tonic , Assorted Complementing Botanicals

Preparation: Add pisco and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Pour ginger ale into the glass to top. Add 2-3 drops of bitters. Garnish with lime wheel.
Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Selecto Acholado Pisco, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 2-3 drops Angostura Bitters,  1 top Ginger Ale

Preparation: Pour Creme de cassis in glass, gently pour champagne on top
PreparationDE: Creme de Cassis in ein Glas geben, vorsichtig Champagner darüber gießen.
PreparationIT: Versare la Creme de cassis nel bicchiere, versai sopra delicatamente lo champagne
Ingredients: 5 parts Champagne, 1 part Creme de Cassis

Preparation: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.
PreparationDE: Gib die Creme de Cassis auf den Boden des Glases und füge dann Wein hinzu.
PreparationIT: Aggiungere la crème de cassis sul fondo del bicchiere, quindi rabboccare con il vino.
Ingredients: 5 parts Champagne, 1 part Creme de Cassis

Preparation: Add soda to bucket first, then add spirits and mixers. Top with ice and garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, 1.5 oz Citrus Agave Blend, 1 splash Soda Water

Preparation: Add spirits and bitters to collins glass. Add large ice cubes and fill with club soda. Garnish with orange peel (or lemon peel).
Ingredients: 1 oz Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VSOP, 1 oz Plymouth Gin, 1 oz Contratto Bianco Vermouth, 2 dash Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6, 3 oz Club Soda

Preparation: Add the Cherry Liqueur to a flute, top with Prosecco, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 4 oz Prosecco

Preparation: Add the cucumber, mint and simple syrup to a mixing glass and muddle. Add everything else, then shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig poking through a cucumber wheel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz House Ginger Beer, .75 oz Lime juice, .75 oz Simple syrup, .25 oz John D. Taylor's Velvet Falernum, 3  Cucumber wheels, 8  Mint leaves, 1  Mint sprig

Preparation: Add vodka and lime juice to drinking glass, add ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .25 oz Lime juice , 3 oz Ginger beer

Preparation: Barrel aged for 5 months in a used bourbon barrel.  Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz Pear Brandy, 1 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc, .5 oz Dolin Genepy

Preparation: Barrel aged in a used bourbon barrel that previously held a cocktail containing Hine Cognac and Luxardo Bitter.  Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .25 oz Leopold Bros. Bitter, .25 oz Velvet Falernum,   Red Hawaiian Salt

Preparation: Blend with ice.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .25 oz F. Meyer Mirabelle (Yellow Plum), .5 oz Fino Sherry, .75 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, 2 oz Horchata, .5 oz Simple Syrup (2:1), .5 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Boil water in a tea kettle.   Squeeze lemon slice into the mug. Insert whole cloves into the lemon slice and drop it into the mug.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hot Water, 2 oz Glenrothes, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 dash Honey

Preparation: Brown sugar cube soaked in Peychaud’s Bitters. Put soaked sugar cube in glass first. Pour .75 oz Pink Pigeon rum into flute over sugar cube. Fill remainder of the glass with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.
Ingredients: 1 cube Brown Sugar, 1 soaked Peychaud's Bitters, .75 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, Champagne

Preparation: Build & Stir. Hoshizaki Ice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Avuá Prata Cachaça, 2 oz Bacardi Superior Rum, 3 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose, 2 oz Lime Juice, 1 oz Cannella Cinnamon Cordial, 2 oz Simple Syrup

Preparation: Build all ingredients except for the Topo Chico in a wine glass. Fill the glass with cubed ice then top with Topo Chico by pouring it down a barspoon to incorporate. Zest the top with orange and place it in the glass. Add edible flowers for aroma and aesthetic.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz London Dry Gin, .75 oz Elderflower Liqueur, 2 dash Citric Acid, 4 drops Orange Flower Water, 2.5 oz Topo Chico Mineral Water

Preparation: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh fennel flowers.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 oz Vermouth del Professore, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash St. George Absinthe

Preparation: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir with ice and strain into coupe. Garnish with grapefruit peel.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .5 oz Curacao, 2 dash Rhubarb Bitters

Preparation: Build all ingredients in a punch bowl and add ice, stir gently. Garnish with seasonal fruit and citrus wheels.
Ingredients: 5 oz Bacardi Superior Rum, 4 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc, 3.5 oz Lemon Juice, 3.5 oz Velvet Falernum

Preparation: Build all into highball. Fill with ice. Top with soda water. Place pineapple leaf vertically in the glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup, 2 oz Coconut Water, 1 fill Soda Water

Preparation: Build and pour in punch bowl over large ice block.
Ingredients: 2 part No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 part Real Cranberry Juice, .25 part Luxardo Fernet, .5 part Lime juice, 1.5 part Puer Black Tea

Preparation: Build and serve in a champagne flute.
Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz St. Germaine Elderflower Liqueur, 1 oz Lemon, 1 oz Vanilla Syrup, 1 oz Prosecco

Preparation: Build cocktail in glass, add ice and stir. Garnish with rose petal.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Lillet Blanc, 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Rose Wine

Preparation: Build in a glass over ice. Add lemon wheels and strawberries. Finish with a splash of fresh lemon or top up with some sparkling wine. This drink can also be made in jugs or punch bowls.
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1.5 oz Cranberry Juice, 1.5 oz Fever-Tree Lemonade

Preparation: Build in a large pitcher or punchbowl. Combine Pink Pigeon Rum, juice from 2 lemons and agave. Blend 7 oz. of fresh watermelon in a blender and puree to mixture. Add a generous amount of ice and stir. Top with ginger beer. Ladle or pour into coupe glasses.
Ingredients: 7 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 oz Agave Syrup, 7 oz Watermelon, 2  Lemon Juice, 1 top Ginger Beer

Preparation: Build in a mixing glass and add ice. Slowly pour back and forth between two tins, about 4-6 times. Then dump the whole cocktail into a Fizz or Collins glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Wild Turkey 101 Bourbon, .75 oz Strawberry, Black Pepper Balsamic Shrub, .75 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1 oz Fever-Tree Tonic Water
Notes: *Strawberry, Black Pepper Balsamic Shrub 1.5 cups strawberries 0.5 cups sugar 2 tsp black peppercorns 0.25 cups balsamic vinegar 0.25 cups champagne vinegar  Combine all ingredients except vinegar in a container and let sit overnight at room temperature. The sugar should be absorbed by the strawberry juice. The next day, puree with a blender and add any additional vinegar to taste. Strain the shrub through chinois to remove any large leftover chunks. Label and date and keep in the fridge.

Preparation: Build in a mixing glass. Add ice. Stir to dilute. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with an orange twist.  *Clarified Milk: -- 1 C Whole Milk -- .5 oz Lemon Juice  Heat milk to just before a simmer, then add lemon juice. Lightly stir to break the solid from the whey. Let chill for 5 mins to allow the solids to properly separate. Coffee strain twice for clarity.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Gin, .75 oz Clarified Milk, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 4 drops Vanilla

Preparation: Build in an ice filled 14 oz beer glass, add BarSol Pisco, Ginger Liqueur, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Roll into a Boston shaker and shake to mix, place cranberry bitters on top, add ginger beer and garnish with a wedge of fresh lime.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .25 oz Agave Nectar, 3-4 drops Cranberry Bitters, 4 oz Ginger Beer
Notes: Featured on The Tales of the Cocktail 2016 Carousel Bar Menu

Preparation: Build in an old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with orange peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .25 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 2 dash Angostura Bitters
Notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.

Preparation: Build in collins glass. Top with soda. Orange peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz Cold Blue Bottle Coffee, .25 oz Luxardo Anisette, 2 dash Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Build in glass. Add crushed ice and swizzle. Top with more crushed ice. Dash pepita tincture on top for aromatics. Garnish with lemon wheel and dried fig.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vino Chinato, 1.5 oz Fig-Infused C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 oz Lemon, .25 oz Simple Syrup

Preparation: Build in ice-filled tall glass, garnish with a squeeze of lime.
Ingredients: 35 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 125 ml Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon

Preparation: Build in old fashioned glass over ice.
Ingredients: 2 oz English Harbour Rum 5 YO, 2 oz Fresh Squeezed Pineapple Juice, 2 oz Fresh Coconut Water

Preparation: Serve in an old fashioned glass over a large ice cube.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, 0.5 oz 15 YO Sherry, 2 dash Dr. Adam's Boker's bitters, 0.25 oz Simple syrup

Preparation: Build in rocks glass. Use cylinder ice cube.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, 0.25 oz Rich Cane Syrup, 2 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters, 2 dash Cinnamon Bitters

Preparation: Build over ice in Old Fashioned glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, 10 ml Amer Picon, 10 ml House Cola Syrup
Notes: Cocktail Inspiration: The inspiration was to use ingredients that were created or changed in that era. The 1880's saw Coca Cola born and the reformulation of Amer Picon along with the push for American Whiskies.  This cocktail was used at Tales of the Cocktail 2013.

Preparation: Build over ice, stir lightly, and garnish with a lime twist and a Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Squeeze of Lime , 3 oz Italian Sparkling Water

Preparation: Build over ice, stir lightly, and garnish with an orange peel or slice and Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, 3 oz Prosecco, 1 splash Sparkling Water

Preparation: Build spirits in a tall glass over clear ice. Top with 4 oz tonic and garnish with a lemon twist curled into a flower if you're feeling fancy.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 2 oz Fever-Tree Indian Tonic, 1 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Build syrup and ice cream in a lowball cocktail glass, and top with soda water. Serve with a metal straw, a spoon, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from jar of cherries), 1 scoop Vanilla Ice Cream, 1 top Soda Water

Preparation: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.
PreparationDE: In ein Glas über das Eis gießen, garnieren und servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare nel bicchiere con ghiaccio, guarnire e servire.
Ingredients: 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz Gin
Notes: For a slightly sweeter version, replace Luxardo bitters with Aperol.

Preparation: Build then pour into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass or mug. Top with hot water. Garnish with the orange slice and add a dash of Peychaud's Bitters.
Ingredients: 1 oz Blended Scotch, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 top Hot Water, 1 dash Peychaud's Bitters
Notes: Featured in The King's Ginger Winter Warmer Program OND 2015

Preparation: Chill coupe glass and garnish rim by coating the outer lip of the glass with a wedge of lemon and dipping into a shallow dish containing superfine white sugar. Place lemon strip neatly along side of sugared coupe. Combine all liquid ingredients into shaker; add ice and shake. Double strain into glass.
Ingredients: 1 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz LemonJuice, .5 oz Orgeat, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Chill cup and place a napkin around it. In the base of the cup put everything except the cider and the raspberry syrup and give a brief stir. Add some crushed ice. Stir vigorously. Top with crushed ice. Add cider. Pour raspberry syrup on top. Garnish with cinnamon quill as a stirrer, some small flowers, and a lime wheel.
Ingredients: 1 oz Montelobos Mezcal, .67 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, 3 oz Apple Cider, .5 oz Monin French Raspberry Syrup
Garnish: Cinnamon Quill, Small Flowers, Lime Wheel

Preparation: Chilled. Serve up or on the rocks.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whiskey, .75 oz Luxardo Bitter, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 2 dash Chocolate Bitters
Notes: Japanese riff on a Left Hand cocktail

Preparation: Cold shake-strain into coupe and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: .75 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .5 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Pineapple Juice

Preparation: Combine all ingredients and shake thoroughly without ice for several minutes. Add ice, shake, and strain into a tall collins glass. Top with soda and garnish with an orange wheel.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux, .5 oz Orgeat, .375 oz Lemon, .375 oz Lime, 1 oz Heavy Whipping Cream, 1  Egg White

Preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Christmas Spirit, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter

Preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir. Pour the mixture into a chilled Nick & Nora glass and garnish with the orange zest.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Graham's 20 Year Tawny Port, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .33 oz Velvet Falernum, .25 oz Benedictine

Preparation: Combine all ingredients besides beer and bitters and dry shake without ice. Add ice and re-shake, double strain into a fizz glass and top with beer. Garnish with shaved nutmeg and 3 drops of bitters.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Christmas Spirit, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Honey syrup, .5 oz Egg white, 2 oz Ale, 3 drops Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients besides blood orange into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution (15-20 seconds). Pour into a small martini glass. Rub a thin slice of blood orange around the rim and place in drink.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except Duke's Lemon garnish in mixing glass and stir. Pour into a rocks glass and garnish. Ice does not touch this drink.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Genevieve Gin, .25 oz Rich Wild Sage Honey Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Whiskey Barrel Aged Bitters, .75 oz Spring Water
Notes: All ingredients should be kept at room temperature.  Rich wild sage honey syrup: 2 parts local unfilteres, unprocessed, raw honey with 1 part water

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except for tonic. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Top with the tonic and garnish with a fresh grapefruit peel.   *Substitute with Yellow Chartreuse Liqueur
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Blanc Vermouth, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Giffard Pamplemousse, .5 oz House-made Yellow Shaw-treuse, .5 oz Tonic, 2 dash Celery Bitters, 2 dash Coriander Tincture

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Aperitivo, .5 oz Round Pond Blood Orange Syrup, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 splash Sparkling Wine

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour over ice in a rocks glass and top with soda. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Round Pond Meyer Lemon Syrup, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 splash Soda water

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a tin and dry shake. Add ice and shake vigorously. Add soda into a collins glass and slowly strain the drink over it until it forms a head. Garnish with one rhubarb stalk.  *Rhubarb Infused Gin: 750 ml of gin with 3 chopped stalks of fresh rhubarb for 48 hours
Ingredients: 2 oz Rhubarb Infused Gin, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lemon, .75 oz Simple Syrup , 1  Egg White,   Soda

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except sparkling wine in a shaker. Add ice and shake until chilled through. Double strain into a champagne flute and garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Elderflower Liqueur, 2 dash Absinthe, 1 top Sparkling Wine

Preparation: Combine all ingredients except the bitters and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Strain over fresh ice into a double old fashioned glass. Dash bitters over the top of the cocktail. Garnish with a dried peach and a piece of candied ginger.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Forester Bourbon, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne, .5 oz Honey syrup (local honey cut 2:1 with water), .75 oz Lemon juice, 1  Egg white, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a chilled mixing glass, rimmed with sea salt and stir. Add ice. Stir again to mix. Garnish with a cocktail shrimp, lemon zest, fresh ground pepper and a celery stalk.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, 6 oz Tomato Juice, 1.5 tsp Demitri's Bloody Mary Seasoning, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice
Garnish: Cocktail Shrimp, Lemon Zest, Celery Stalk

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a Collins glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of ginger and lemon wheel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Fresh-pressed Lemon Juice, .5 oz Snake Oil's House-made Sarsaparilla Syrup, .75 oz Carbonated Water, 1 dash Snake Oil's House-made Pomegranate Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a frozen mixing glass with hard ice and stir for 20 seconds. Strain into a frozen coupe glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Apricot brandy, .5 oz Dry vermouth, .5 oz Sweet vermouth
Notes: Vermouth: Vermouth, like wine goes bad if it has been open for a while. Also it's best to keep it in the refrigerator after it has been open to keep it fresh. Vermouth will last about 3-4 months. There are many producers of vermouth, all varying in style and flavor, so we would recommend trying a couple out and finding which you prefer. It's also fun to taste the difference. This goes for both dry (French) and sweet (Italian). Depending on the type you use, you might want to adjust the quantities used in your cocktail to your liking.  Apricot brandy: There are many brands out there. We like to use the Rothman & Winter. Unlike other fruit liqueurs that can be cloyingly sweet, the Rothman & Winter delivers a sweetness and bouquet expected when enjoying a fresh apricot.  This is a nice cocktail for vodka martini drinkers that want a little twist on their cocktail. It's essentially a perfect martini made with vodka and apricot brandy.

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a glass filled with ice and garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz Cocchi Americano, 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Club Soda

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and add ice. Shake well and double strain and serve into a coupe.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sage leaf speared through two cocktail onions.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, 2 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,   Salt

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and the edible flower of your choice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Lacuesta Blanco Vermouth, .25 oz Salers Gentiane Aperitif, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 bsp Germain-Robin Absinthe, 2 dash Scrappy’s Lime Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: 1 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, 1.5 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), 1 bsp Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 dash Angostura bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and then stir. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Apricot Eau-de-Vie, .25 oz Grenadine, 2 dash Lemon Bitters, 2 dash Absinthe

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a picked cucumber ribbon.  *Nori-Infused Sake:  -- Ginjo Sake -- Nori Seaweed Sheet  Using an Oji Style Cold Brew Coffee Maker, drip Ginjo sake through a 0.5 gram of nori seaweed sheet that has been hand-shredded. It takes 3 hours to infuse a 750 ml bottle.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1.5 oz Nori-Infused Sake, 1 dash Celery Bitters, 3 dash Islay Scotch

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir until 2 oz water is diluted. Strain into a sherry or nosing glass. Flame and discard an orange peel. Drink deeply.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Bonal, .5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .25 oz Nocino

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin. Shake and strain into a collins glass full of crushed ice. Garnish with apple slices.  *Chamomile Tea Syrup:  -- 2 c water -- 1 c chamomile flower -- 1 c sugar Bring 1 cup water to boil. Add 1 cup chamomile flower and 1 more cup of water, bring back to a boil. Add 1 cup sugar, bring to boil.  Let it rest. When cool, the syrup is ready.
Ingredients: 1 oz Glenrothes Bourbon Reserve, 1.5 oz C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie, .5 oz Chamomile Tea Syrup, .75 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl, add a large chunk or block of ice, garnish with lemon wheels and apple slices. Serve when punch is chilled.
Ingredients: 1.5 part Gin, .25 part Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .75 part Casoni 1814, .5 part Dry Vermouth, 1 part Unfiltered Apple Juice, 1 part Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 part Rich Simple Syrup (2:1), 2 part Jasmine Green Tea

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until proper dilution. Double strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass and garnish with 2 fresh basil leaves that have been lightly "spanked" to release aromatics.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup,   Gin Barrel Aged Orange Bitters,   Fresh Basil Leaves

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and shake vigorously. Double strain using a fine mesh strainer. Serve in a lager glass over ice.
Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Ouro Reserva Especial, 1 oz Jalapeno-Orange Simple Syrup, 1 oz Coconut Milk, 4 dash Orange Flower Water, 9 drops Mole Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a highball glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Don Ciccio & Figli Concerto, .125 oz Vanilla Marinade, 8 dash Mole Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin filled with crushed ice. Flash-shake and dump into a double old fashioned glass. Garnish.
Ingredients: 1 oz Applejack, 1 oz Amontillado Sherry, .75 oz Orgeat, .75 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 bsp Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice, and shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a highball glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .5 oz Penny Blue Mauritian Rum, 6 dash Celery Shrub, 3 dash House-made Tarragon Tincture

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker, except the apple cider. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice. Top with apple cider. Garnish with shaved cinnamon and nutmeg.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Orange Liquor, 1.5 oz House-made Spiced Pumpkin Puree, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Ginger Syrup, 1  Egg White, 1 top Apple Cider

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaking tin and give it a short shake, five seconds. Strain into an old fashined glass with three medium sized ice cubes.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz Zirbenz Stone Pine, .75 oz Fresh Strawberry Juice w/ Xanthan Gum*, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Simple Syrup
Notes: *Fresh strawberry juice with xanthan gum for texture and mouthfeel: Set your digital scale to grams. Juice a pint of strawberries. Weigh the rendered liquid from the strawberries. Add .01% grams of xanthan gum to your total weight of rendered liquid and mix with an immersion blender. Fine strain the liquid.

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaking tin or mixing glass and vigorously shake without ice for 10 seconds. Add ice, and shake for another 8 seconds. Strain over larger ice cube or into a cocktail glass and add freshly grated cinnamon on top.  *Vanilla Syrup:  Split 1 vanilla pod lengthwise and scrape interior into a heavy sauce pan.  Add 2 c. raw sugar and 2 c. water. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat to low.  Cook for 5 mins and stir occasionally.  Remove from heat and keep unstrained for 24 hrs.  Strain through a cheese cloth and bottle. Keeps for 2 weeks.  **Coconut Cream: Combine 1 part Coco Lopez with 1 part rich coconut milk. Mix well.
Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, .25 oz Vanilla Syrup, .5 oz Coconut Cream, .5 oz Egg White

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a sparkling wine glass.
Ingredients: 4 oz Ca' Secco Sparkling, 1 bsp Luxardo Cherry Syrup

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .25 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .16 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Perfect Puree Apricot, .5 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a wine glass, stir to mix. Add ice and enjoy.   Convert ounces to cups to make a larger pitcher for you and your guests.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .75 oz Honey Syrup (1:1 honey & water), 1 oz Pomegranate Juice, 3 oz Rose Wine, Cinnamon grated, Nutmeg grated, Cherries, Strawberries, Watermelon

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into chilled cocktail coupe or Nick & Nora. Expel lemon peel over cocktail then place in glass.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 2 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass. Stir and strain into Nick & Nora cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest and yerba mate tea sachet.  *Bay Leaf Syrup: -- 16 oz Water -- 12 Bay Leaves -- 1.5 C White Sugar  Bring water to boil with bay leaves. Lower heat to medium and simmer 15-20 mins. Stir in white sugar until dissolved, without bringing to a boil again. Remove from heat, let cool at room temperature. Remove bay leaves and enjoy.  **Salt Tincture: -- .5 C Salt -- 1 C Water -- 2 C 100p Vodka  Stir salt with water and vodka. Stir until dissolved. Strain out extra salt, if any.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1.5 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .25 oz Bay Leaf Syrup, 2 dash Salt Tincture
Garnish: Lemon Zest, Yerba Mate Tea Sachet

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in Perlini sparkling cocktail shaker, shake and double strain into cocktail glass. (For home use, combine all ingredients, add ice shake 30 seconds and double strain into coupe, add splash of soda water.) Spray with atomized Old Tom Gin. Garnish with cucumber peel or candied rhubarb slice.  *Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin: -- 1 bottle Junipero Gin -- 1 qt Chopped Rhubarb -- 1 Chopped Large English Cucumber -- .5 Bunch (15g) Fresh Mint (with stems)  Combine all ingredients in vacuum sealed bag and circulate at 53º for 2 hours. (For home use, combine all ingredients in plastic container and let rest for one week.)  *Rhubarb Syrup: Juice 1 qt (8-10 Stalks) Add to 1 qt of unbleached Cane sugar in saucepan and bring to simmer. Remove from heat, allow to cool and strain in Chinoise.
Ingredients: 2 oz Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .5 oz Rhubarb Juice, .5 oz Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Rhubarb Syrup, 2 dash Fee Brothers Celery Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in shaker. Dry shake for 10 seconds, add ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into small tumbler. Garnish with a sprinkle of grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .5 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Simple syrup, .5 oz Egg white, 1 dash Fee Bros Rhubarb bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in to a mixing glass and add ice.  Stir for about 10-15 seconds.  Strain in to a cocktail coupe or a glass of your choosing.  Garnish with an orange twist expressed over the top of the drink.
Ingredients: 2 oz J.H. Cutter Whisky, .75 oz Averna Amaro, .5 oz Alvear PX Sherry, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a large punch bowl and add large ice cube/cubes. Garnish liberally with slice fruits.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Honey Jalapeño syrup, 1 oz Orange juice, .5 oz Lemon juice, 1 oz Soda water
Garnish: Sliced Peaches, Jalapeños, Lemons and Oranges

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an olive.
Ingredients: 4 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz Olive Juice, 1 dash Dry Vermouth

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir for about 10 seconds and then strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with skewered apple spheres and be thankful you're having a cocktail, and not having an apple shot off your head.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .75 oz C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 4 dash Black Walnut Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir until proper dilution and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: 1 oz Hophead Vodka, 1 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Maurin Quina

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled bucket glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a dukes lemon and dukes grapefruit zest.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 dash Angostura bitters, 1 dash Fee Brothers Gin Barrel Aged Bitters
Garnish: Dukes Lemon Zest, Dukes Grapefruit Zest

Preparation: Combine all ingredients into mixing glass. Add ice. Stir until very cold. Strain and fine strain to prevent ice chips in coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist entwined around a cinnamon stick.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .5 oz BarSol Pisco, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Dry Vermouth

Preparation: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, strain into martini glass, top with prosecco, garnish with sage.
Ingredients: 1.75 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Velvet Falernum, .5 oz Lime juice, .5 oz Pear Sage Foam, 1 float Prosecco

Preparation: Combine all ingredients, add ice, and shake. Double strain into an old fashioned glass and add fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice (1/4 wheel) and Luxardo Cherry (both speared).  *0.25 - 0.50 oz Cane Sugar Syrup (to taste to allow variations in citrus flavor when batching)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Jack Daniel's, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .25 oz Cane Sugar Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Orange Bitters

Preparation: Combine all ingredients, minus the sparkling wine, into a tin. Shake and double strain into a flute glass. Top with a float of sparkling wine. Garnish with an edible flower petal.
Ingredients: 2 oz Old Tom Gin, .5 oz Noilly Prat Ambre Vermouth, .5 oz Pineapple Juice, .5 oz Lime Juice, .25 oz Rich Simple (2:1), .75 float Dry Sparkling Wine

Preparation: Combine all ingredients, shake for 20 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a snifter. Garnish with shaved nutmeg.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1.5 oz Averna, .75 oz Honey, 1 whole Egg

Preparation: Combine all ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: .75 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz El Tesoro Reposado Tequila, .5 oz Grüner Veltliner, .5 oz Lime, .25 oz Pineapple Gum, 1 bsp Sweet Marmalade

Preparation: Combine all liquid ingredients in a chilled mixing glass with cracked ice and stir for 20 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over a large cube placed in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz Gran Duque d Alba Solera gran Reserva brandy, .75 oz Carpano Antica Vermouth, .25 oz Benedictine, 1 tincture Peychaud's Bitters, 1 tincture Angostura bitters
Notes: This cocktail is a spin on a classic cocktail called the "Vieux Carré" or "Old Square". The original cocktail was created by a bartender at The Hotel Monteleone in New Orleans. Though this drink may have been derived from a traditional vermouth cocktail created in the mid-1800s, many people who encounter the Vieux Carré today will equate it to a Manhattan variation, served on the rocks.  This new or "Nieux" version is a little nuttier and lighter in body. The nutty flavors of the sherry brandy really play off the savory earthy notes of the Karlsson's Gold Vodka. Enjoy this cocktail with some cheese or as an after dinner drink. It is perfect in front of a fireplace.

Preparation: Combine all liquid ingredients in a highball or Collins glass with ice. Stir lightly and garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .75 oz Esprit de June, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Simple syrup
Notes: This is a perfect spring or summer cocktail. The Esprit de June is a product that offers a touch of floral complexity. The brightness of the lemon really works well with the floral notes of the Esprit de June.  The name is a play on words stating that less is more or (L.E.S. is more). The L.E.S. is an abbreviation for two things. First being Lower East Side as it is a NYC inspired cocktail. Second being Lemon, Esprit de June, and Seltzer. The three ingredients used in the cocktail to complement the Karlsson's Vodka.

Preparation: Combine all liquids with exception of sodas, sir together. Strain into collins glass with singular large cube. Top with sodas. Garnish with sliver of poached pear from syrup (kept chilled).  *Rose Poached Pear Syrup: -- 1.5 C Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar) -- 1.5 C Water  -- 2 C Sugar -- 1 Large Lemon -- 1 Half Orange -- 1 tsp Ground Ginger (not fresh) -- 1 tsp Vanilla -- 3-5 Whole Cloves  Combine Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar), water, and sugar. Bring to a simmer. Add zest of lemon and an orange, ground ginger, vanilla, and cloves. Peel and halve pears, set gently into liquid. Keep just under a simmer for 15 mins. Remove from heat, let cool at least 20 mins. Pears will keep for 3 days refrigerated in syrup. The syrup itself will last longer.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Citadelle Gin, 2 dash Orange Bitters, .25 oz Rose Poached Pear Syrup, 1 oz Topo Chico Mineral Water, 1 oz Fever-Tree Sparkling Lemon

Preparation: Combine all the ingredients except Prosecco. Add a large block of ice or large ice cubes and stir. Top with Prosecco. Garnish with orange wheels studded with cloves and float some mint sprigs in the bowl.
Ingredients: 9 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 6 oz Marrakesh Mint Tea, 6 oz Prosecco, 3 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 2 oz Lemon Juice, 1.5 oz Velvet Falernum, .5 oz Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters
Garnish: Orange wheels studded with cloves, Mint sprigs

Preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and stir for about 10 seconds. Strain in to an Old Fashioned glass or glass of your choosing. Add large ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wheel, mint sprigs and a blackberry.  *Moroccan Mint Tea (Numi Tea Brand): -- 1 Moroccan Mint Tea Bag -- 8 oz. Boiling Water   Combine the tea bag and the boiling water in a cup or a pot. Let steep for 5 minutes. Remove the tea bag and place the tea in the fridge to cool. Label and date the container. Will keep for 1 week.  **Rich Honey Syrup: -- 10 oz. Honey -- 5 oz. Hot Water  Combine both ingredients together in a container and stir until fully incorporated. Label and date the container. Will keep in the fridge for 2 weeks.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz J.H. Cutter Whisky, 1 oz  Moroccan Mint Tea (chilled), .75 oz The King's Ginger, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Rich Honey Syrup
Notes: This can be served individually, but can also be made in to a punch and just served over one large block of ice. Just garnish with lots of lemon wheels, mint leaves and blackberries.

Preparation: Combine all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Stir on the rocks. Garnish with lemon peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, 1 bsp Kalani Coconut Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Combine bourbon, lemon juice, and syrup in a shaker and add cold ice. Shake until chilled well (10-30 sec. depending on the quality of the ice). Strain into a collins glass and slowly pour the vermouth into the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.   *Orange-scented Maple Syrup: combine 6 oz. of grade B maple syrup, 6 oz. filtered water and the peel of 1 orange, with a minimum amount of pith in a non-reactive pan.  Simmer for 10 mins. Remove from heat and allow it to cool to room temp. before using.  Syrup will keep for 1 month if refrigerated.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Orange-scented Maple Syrup*, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso

Preparation: Combine Gin, Maraschino, juices, and bitters in an ice-filled mixing tin and shake for 20-30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain over fresh ice into a Collins glass, top with the California Lager, and garnish with the grapefruit peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz Grapefruit Juice, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters, 1 fill Anchor California Lager

Preparation: Combine H by HINE, King's Ginger Liqueur, and bitters over ice in a mixing glass. Stir until you reach proper dilution(15-20 seconds). Strain over a large ice rock in a bucket glass and garnish with Luxardo Cherries.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE (Brown Butter-Infused), 0.5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters

Preparation: Combine Hophead Vodka, Kings Ginger, and lime juice in a Collins glass and fill with ice. Top with ginger beer. Stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice, 1 top Ginger Beer

Preparation: Combine Hophead, lemon juice, Giffard Pamplemousse, honey syrup, and bitters in a shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled glass. Fill the glass with beer.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hophead Vodka, .75 oz Giffard Pamplemousse, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 1 top IPA

Preparation: Combine Hophead, lemon juice, King's Ginger, honey syrup, egg white, and bitters in a shaker and dry shake to emulsify egg whites. Add ice and shake vigorously until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled fizz glass. Empty ice out of shakers and fill shaker with ale to create a froth. Pour this froth over the drink and garnish with half an orange wheel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Hophead Vodka, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 oz Breckle's Brown Ale, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, .5 oz Honey Syrup, .5 oz Egg White, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Combine ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Grate nutmeg on top.  *Bywater Spice Mix: Simple syrup infused with Vietnamese cinnamon, licorice root, and clove
Ingredients: 1.5 oz HINE Rare VSOP, .5 oz Cynar, .5 oz Bywater Spice Mix*, 1 oz Cold-Brew Coffee

Preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain and serve up with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 2 oz Christmas Spirit, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .25 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), 1 dash Fee Brother's Orange Bitters

Preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a flamed orange peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, 1 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters

Preparation: Combine ingredients in a pint glass, stir with ice to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with mint and lemon wedge flag.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Barr Hill Gin, .75 oz Falernum, 1 oz Topo Chico Mineral Water, 1 dash Lemon Bitters

Preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with nutmeg.  *Winter Spice Brown Sugar Syrup:  -- 2 qt Brown Sugar -- 2 qt Water -- 3 Tbsp Ground Ginger -- 3 Tbsp Ground Nutmeg -- 1 Tbsp Clove  Heat and simmer the below ingredients in a medium pot for 15 minutes. Strain with cheesecloth.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Oloroso Sherry, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Winter Spice Brown Sugar Syrup*, 1 oz Pineapple Juice

Preparation: Combine ingredients in an old fashioned glass filled with ice, stir to combine, and garnish with orange peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, 1 oz Barolo Chinato, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or

Preparation: Combine ingredients in mixing glass, and stir with ice to dilution. Strain into a coupe cocktail glass. Garnish with a trimmed carrot ribbon.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Reisetbauer Carrot Eau De Vie, .75 oz Genevieve Gin

Preparation: Combine ingredients into a chilled punch bowl, ice and dilute appropriately, garnish seasonally.
Ingredients: 1 part No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 part Rooibus Tea (steeped and cooled), 1 part Mulled Cider (cooled), .5 part Clover Honey Syrup, .33 part Cava,   Angostura

Preparation: Combine ingredients into a cocktail shaker.  Shake with ice vigorously for 10-15 seconds.  Strain into a chilled coupe glass. No garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Whisky Miyagikyo Single Malt 12 YO, .75 oz Rare Wine Co. Charleston Sercial Madeira, .75 oz Fresh lime juice, .625 oz Small Hands Food orgeat

Preparation: Combine ingredients into a hot mug, top with hot water and garnish with a rough orange twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Clover Honey Syrup

Preparation: Combine ingredients into a mixing glass, add ice and shake until properly diluted. Double strain into a glass over fresh ice, garnish with a cucumber wheel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Pimms, 1 bsp Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Fresh lime juice, .75 oz Simple syrup, 5 leaves Basil leaves

Preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir. Strain over a large cube in a rocks glass and garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: 1 oz BenRiach Single Malt 12 YO, 1 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, 1 oz Luxardo Aperitivo

Preparation: Combine ingredients, stir until well chilled, and strain in to a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, 1 oz Cocchi Vermouth di Torino, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, 3 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Combine ingredients. Pour over big cube and stir. Add the grapefruit peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Carpano Antica, 1 bsp Calisaya, 3 dash The Bitter Truth Grapefruit Bitters

Preparation: Combine Luxardo Bitters and Dolin Blanc. Stir in mixing glass until chilled. Strain into flute. Top with prosecco. Zest with grapefruit. Garnish with long grapefruit zest.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Dolin Blanc, 2.5 oz Prosecco

Preparation: Combine Luxardo, BarSol, and tincture. Ice, stir, and strain into chilled coupe. Top with Prosecco. Gently set candied blood orange wheel (thinly sliced) garnish into drink and serve.  *Castillian Tincture: -- 750 ml Luxardo Grappa Euganea -- 20 g Sliced Blanched Almond -- 2 g Spanish Saffron -- 3 Sliced Madagascan Vanilla Beans -- 3 g Toasted Green Cardamom -- 4 Lemon Peels (pith removed) -- 2 Quartered Dried Pajarero Figs -- 2 Quartered Quartered Medjool Dates  Combine all ingredients, gently agitate twice daily for 14 days. Fine filter and store.  **Candied Blood Orange Wheels: -- 1 Blood Orange (sliced thin - approx. 10 slices/orange) -- .5 c Natural Sugar -- .25 c Water -- 2 Tbsp Corn Syrup  Combine sugar, water, and corn syrup in shallow saucepan. Slow simmer on low heat approx. 10 min. When thickened mixture begins to cling to sides of pan, add orange slices. Allow to simmer for 5 more min. and remove from hardening syrup. Place slices on parchment-lined oven rack. Air dry overnight, then bake 10 min. at 400°F (or dehydrate them).
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .25 oz Castilian Tincture*, .75 oz BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, 2 oz Prosecco

Preparation: Combine Luxardo, cachaca, gin, coconut water, tincture and almond extract in a yari (mixing glass). Add ice. Stir for proper dilution (30-40 revolutions). Pour in collins glass over a clarified ice sphere. Top cocktail with Fever-Tree. Add 3 almond slices for garnish.  *Toasted Coconut Tincture: -- 4 oz (by weight) Semisweet Coconut Flakes -- High-Proof Neutral Grain Spirit (preferably Everclear)  Lightly toast semisweet coconut flakes. Put in a small mason jar. Fill jar with high-proof neutral grain spirit. Let sit for 3 days then strain off.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz Avua Cachaca Prata, .75 oz Broker's London Dry Gin, .75 oz Coconut Water, 2 dash Toasted Coconut Tincture*, 1 dash Almond Extract, 1 top Fever-Tree Mediterranean Tonic Water

Preparation: Combine Luxardo, gin, apple water and citric acid solution into a shaker tin and shake to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a slice of Fuji apple lightly dusted with cinnamon.  *Apple Water: -- 1 Fuji Apple -- 2 c Water  Slice Fuji apple and combine with water. Vacuum seal and place in a sous-vide for 3-4 hrs at 130°F. Strain apples; water is ready for use.  **Citric Acid Solution: -- 1 ml gram Citric Acid -- 3 ml Water  Combine citric acid and water. Stir until dissolved.
Ingredients: .5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1.5 oz Apple Water*, 1 ml Citric Acid Solution**

Preparation: Combine rum, curacao, violettes, and lime juice in a shaker, add ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled collins glass. Add fresh ice in the collins glass and top with chilled ginger beer. Float 2-3 dashes of Angostura Bitters on top and garnish with a grilled pineapple wedge on rim of glass, and two Luxardo Cherries speared through a toothpick, and edible orchid placed on top hanging from the rim.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz D'aristi 10 YR Rum, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, .25 oz Tempus Fugit Liqueur de Violettes, 1 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Tahitian Vanilla Bean Syrup, 1 float Ginger Beer, 3 dash Angostura Bitters
Garnish: Grilled Pineapple Wedge, Luxardo Cherries, Edible Orchid

Preparation: Combine the coffee and whiskey in a preheated cup. Top with Irish cream and pour the absinthe over the back of a spoon to float. Garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .25 oz Absinthe, 4 oz Hot coffee, 2-3 oz Homemade Irish Cream
Notes: *this drink was served at Portland Cocktail Week 2013

Preparation: Combine the ingredients in a Boston shaker or cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Strain the contents into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Light Rum, .75 oz  Cointreau, .75 oz Lime Juice, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .125 oz Simple Syrup (optional)

Preparation: Combine the ingredients. Shake and strain over ice. Lemon and/or cherry flag garnish.  Add soda water if you'd like to water it down.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Combine the Karlsson's Gold Vodka and grapefruit in a shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds and strain over fresh ice in an old-fashioned glass that has a salted rim. Top the cocktail with the club soda.
Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Fresh grapefruit juice, 1 oz Club soda, 1 tincture Grapefruit bitters
Notes: Play around with different kinds of salt. The salty swede uses yuzu salt.

Preparation: Combine the lime, elderflower, tincture and cherries into a shaker tin. Muddle the cherries and then add the Junipero Gin. Shake with ice. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.  *Chili Tincture: -- Chiles (Habaneros or Bird’s eye Chiles recommended) -- Grain Alcohol or Vodka  Fill a small jar with stemmed hot chili peppers and cover with grain alcohol or high-proof vodka. Let soak for 3 days; strain.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Giffard Elderflower Liqueur, 1 oz Lime Juice, 8-9 drops Chili Tincture*, 6  Luxardo Maraschino Cherries

Preparation: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the cola, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 3 oz Coca-Cola, .5 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the ginger beer, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 3 oz Ginger Beer, .5 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Combine these ingredients and roll gently over ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with pumpkin foam.
Ingredients: 3 oz Domingo Perez Marin 'la Guita' Manzanilla Sherry, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Chartreuse , .25 oz Juice of an Orange

Preparation: Combine vodka, ginger liqueur, lemon juice, ginger-cinnamon syrup and bitters in tins with ice and shake. Double strain into collins glass over fresh ice and top with club soda.  *Ginger-Cinnamon Syrup:  Equal parts demerara sugar, clover honey, fresh ginger juice, water. Combine demerara sugar and clover honey and top with boiling water. Stir to dissolve. Once cooled add fresh ginger juice and stir to mix.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Absolut Vodka, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Fresh Lemon Juice , 1 oz Ginger-Cinnamon Syrup*, 2 dash Bar Keep Lavender Spice Bitters, 1 top Club Soda

Preparation: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.
PreparationDE: Limette und Zucker in ein old-fashioned Glas geben und vermengen (die beiden Zutaten mit einem Mixer oder einem Holzlöffel vermengen). Füllen Sie das Glas mit Eis und geben Sie den Cacha dazu.
PreparationIT: Mettere il lime e lo zucchero nel bicchiere vecchio stile e pestare (schiacciare i due ingredienti insieme usando un pestello o un cucchiaio di legno).Riempi il bicchiere di ghiaccio e aggiungi la Cachaça.
Ingredients: 1/2 oz Cachaca, 1 Lime, 2 tsp Sugar

Preparation: Dash each bitter and the Fernet over sugar cube in base of Champagne glass so that the sugar is fully saturated with mixture. Add Pink Pigeon Rum and top with chilled Champagne. Garnish with a twist of lemon.
Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 fill Champagne, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 1 dash Peach bitters, 1 dash Luxardo Fernet

Preparation: Double strain into a martini glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Briottet Creme de Framboise (Raspberry), .5 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Simple syrup*
Notes: *Simple syrup is infused with basil leaves and cherry tomato confit muddled.

Preparation: Dry Shake (no ice), Wet Shake (with ice) & Double Strain.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Orgeat, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 1 oz Pear & Celery Puree, .5  Egg white

Preparation: Dry shake all ingredients for 20-30 seconds. Then shake with ice. Double strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with wide lemon swath.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Rye Whiskey, 1 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Angostura Bitters, 1  Egg White

Preparation: Dry shake all ingredients. Hard shake with ice. Double strain into small pilsner glass. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Demerara Syrup (1:1), .75 oz Lemon Juice, 1  Egg White

Preparation: Dry shake and then shake with hand cracked ice. Serve in a goblet with grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz English Harbour Rum, 3 spoon Sugar, 1 whole Egg, .5 oz Milk, .5 oz Cream

Preparation: Dry shake whole egg until emulsified. Then add Kold Draft ice and all ingredients except bitters and shake vigorously until cold. Strain into chilled royal coupette and garnish with apple wheels.
Ingredients: 1 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Sweetened Apple Cider, 2 dash Baked Apple Bitters, 1 whole Egg

Preparation: Dry shake, add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Lime juice, .75 oz Hibiscus/rose syrup, 1  Egg white

Preparation: Dry Shake, add ice and shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into a Copita Glass. Garnish with Dill.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Jummai Ginjo Sake, .25 oz Luxardo Limoncello, .25 oz Dill Cordial, .5 oz Meyer Lemon Juice, .25 oz Yuzu Juice, .5 oz Fresh egg White

Preparation: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass coated in vanilla-salt solution.
Ingredients: 30 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 15 ml Dry Oloroso Sherry, 15 oz Grenadine, 1 whole Egg,   Vanilla-Salt Spray

Preparation: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass.
Ingredients: 40 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 10 ml Campari, 10 ml Lavender syrup, 10 ml Lemon juice , 10 ml Orange juice, 25 ml Egg white

Preparation: Dry shake, strain, top with porter.
Ingredients: .5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz El Dorado 12 Year Old Rum, .5 oz Hamilton Black Jamaican Pot Still Rum, .5 oz Cinnamon Syrup, .5 oz Heavy Cream, 1 tsp St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram, 1 whole Egg, 1 top Founders Porter

Preparation: Dry shake, then serve old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Drizzle Bitter on top to finish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 2.5 oz Fresh orange juice, 1 Tbsp Luxardo Bitter, 1 dash Milk powder (or cream)

Preparation: Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain into flute or sour glass. Top with a Saison.  Zest orange over top and garnish with a star anise.
Ingredients: 1 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 1.25 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Peach Brandy, .5 oz Lemon juice, .5 oz Egg white

Preparation: Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain over cubed ice.
Ingredients: 50 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 4  Pink Peppercorns, 25 ml Fresh lemon juice, 15 ml Gomme syrup, 25 ml Egg white

Preparation: Dry shake. Add ice, shake. Double strain into a frozen coupe glass. Garnish with lemon twist or dehydrated apple slice.
Ingredients: 2 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Giffard Abricot du Roussillon, .5 oz Egg White

Preparation: dryshake/shake/dblrocks  garnish jalapeño slice
Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, .5 oz Green Chartreuse, .5 oz Lime juice, 1 oz Pineapple juice, .5 oz Jalapeño Syrup, .5 oz Egg White

Preparation: Fill a 10-oz mug with boiling water. When the mug is hot, pour out the water and add the amaretto and cider. Top with a layer of cream. Grate fresh cinnamon on top as a garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 8 oz Apple Cider, 1 oz Heavy Cream, 1 oz Cinnamon

Preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all ingredients except the garnish and shake well. Stain into a very chilled martini glass (martini glass should have a sugar rim on half of the glass) and top with a splash of ginger beer. Garnish with a mint leaf and orange peel. Right before serving drop in a chip of dry ice for the mist.
Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, 2 oz Reed's Premium Ginger Brew, 1 tsp Seedless Blackberry Jam, 1  Lime, Juiced, 12  Mint Leaves, Muddled
Notes: Cocktail created by interior designer contest winner, Tineke Triggs.

Preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass and garnish with the grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Aperol, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Fill a collins or highball glass with cracked or cubed ice. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake and strain into the glass.  *SC Demerara Syrup: -- 2 C Water -- 1 C Demerara Sugar -- 3 C Granulated Sugar  Bring water to boil in a saucepan over high heat. Add the demerara sugar and stir vigorously with a whisk (or use an immersion blender) until sugar is dissolved, about 1 minute (the water should become clear). Add granulated sugar and stir vigorously until dissolved, about 1 minute. Remove from heat and let cool.
Ingredients: 1 oz Blended Lightly Aged Rum, 1 oz Blended Aged Rum, .75 oz Lime Juice, .5 oz Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, .5 oz SC Demerara Syrup*, .5 oz Grapefruit Juice, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice, and build the syrup, lemon juice, and soda water. Stir, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from jar of cherries), .25 oz Fresh Lemon Juice (optional), 6 oz Soda Water

Preparation: Fill a mixing glass half full with ice. Add cognac, orgeat, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over the drink and drop in as a garnish.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, 3 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Fill a mug with very hot water to warm the glass up. Once the glass is hot, empty it and add all the liquid ingredients. Stir well until the honey is incorporated. Garnish with the clove studded orange peel and enjoy.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Benedictine, .5 oz Orange juice, .5 oz Honey
Garnish: Long orange peel studded with cloves
