Ingredients: 1.5 oz Citrus-flavored Vodka, .75 oz Luxardo Limoncello, .5 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 1 oz Fresh sweet n' sour, .5 oz Egg white

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice then strain over fresh ice into an old fashioned glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, .75 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Egg white

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, .5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), .5 oz Lemon juice, 1 dash Fee Bros. Rhubard Bitters

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, .5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .5 oz Lemon juice, 2 dash Angostura Orange Bitters

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Vanilla flavored Vodka, .75 oz Luxardo Limoncello, 1 oz Fresh sweet n' sour, .5 oz Passion fruit puree, .5 oz Egg white, 7 dash Green Tabasco

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with lots of ice. Strain into serving glass. Top off with a splash of club soda.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Fresh Lime Juice, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, .25 oz Pages Elderflower Syrup

Preparation: Shake all ingredients. Serve over crushed ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a sage leaf.  *Substitute with Perfect Puree Green Apple flavor
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Lemorton Pommeau de Normandie, .75 oz House-made Green Apple Purée*, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Honey Syrup

Preparation: Shake all ingredients. Strain and top with ginger beer. Give it a quick stir.   Tajin ground ginger and salt rim.
Ingredients: .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Ancho Reyes Chile Liqueur, .5 oz Montelobos Mezcal, .5 oz Aviation Gin, .5 oz Grapefruit Juice, .5 oz Lime Juice, 2 dash Bittercube Bitters Jamaican #2, 2 oz Fever-Tree Ginger Beer

Preparation: Shake all the ingredients a part from the Prosecco. Double strain in an highball. Fill with crushed Ice. Top up with a touch of Prosecco.  Garnish with a mint sprig, a marshmallow on a stick, and a green and white striped paper straw.
Ingredients: 20 ml Monkey Shoulder Blended Scotch Whisky, 15 ml King's Ginger Liqueur, 20 ml Mezcal, 20 ml Agave Syrup, 15 ml Lime Juice, 4  Mint Leaves, 1 top Prosecco

Preparation: Shake all the ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange twist.
Ingredients: 50 ml H by HINE, 25 ml Calvados, 25 ml Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco

Preparation: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Lustau East India Solera, .25 oz Grand Marnier, .25 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Simple Syrup

Preparation: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Lustau Amontillado Sherry, 1 oz Bols Genever, .5 oz Orange Juice, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Shake and 2x strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel and Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .25 oz St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram, 1 oz Apple Cider, .5 oz Belle Brillet, .5 oz Lemon, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 2 oz Ginger Beer

Preparation: Shake and double strain into a coupe. Garnish with sage.  *Pear Syrup: -- Pear -- Sage -- White Pepper -- Star Anise
Ingredients: 1 oz Chinaco Blanco Tequila, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .5 oz Pear Syrup*, .5 oz Lemon Juice, 1 pinch Grey Sea Salt

Preparation: Shake and double strain into double rocks glass. Garnish with torched cinnamon stick and Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz Westland American Single Malt, .25 oz Lustau Pedro Ximénez Sherry, .75 oz Lemon Juice, .5 oz Fig & Cinnamon Syrup, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Shake and serve up in a martini glass with lemon peel rind.
Ingredients: 1 oz No. 209 Gin, 1 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz St. Germain, 1 oz Lemon Juice

Preparation: Shake and serve up.
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie, .5 oz Fresh lemon juice, .5 oz Fresh orange juice, 1 dash Jerry Thomas Bitters

Preparation: Shake and serve up. Garnish elaborately with a Luxardo Cherry and a grapefruit peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, 1 oz Fresh Grapefruit Juice, .25 oz Simple Syrup, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Chocolate Mole Bitters

Preparation: Shake and strain into a martini glass, spray some absinthe on the glass.
Ingredients: 45 ml Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 15 ml Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), 20 ml Luxardo Liquore St. Antonio

Preparation: Shake and strain into a martini glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, .5 oz Honey syrup , .75 oz Fresh lemon syrup ,   Tarragon leaves,   Lavender bitters

Preparation: Shake and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: 2 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Lime Juice, .75 oz Green Chartreuse, .75 oz Simple Syrup

Preparation: Shake and strain into a tiki cat filled with crushed ice.
Ingredients: 1 oz Miso washed White Rhum Agricole, 1 oz Cocchi Vermouth di Torino, .75 oz Falernum, .75 oz Coconut Cream, .25 oz Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .75 oz Lime, .5 oz Mandarin Orange

Preparation: Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.  *Don's Mix: -- 2 parts Grapefruit Juice -- 1 part Cinnamon Syrup
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1.5 oz Don's Mix*, .75 oz Lime Juice, .25 oz Simple Syrup, 1 dash Bittermens 'Elemakule Tiki Bitters

Preparation: Shake and strain into ice filled glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1.5 oz Grape juice, 1 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), 1 oz Fresh pomegranate juice, .75 oz Cinnamon syrup, .75 oz Fresh lime juice, 4  Grapes
Notes: Served at the 7 Pisco Brands: 14 Cocktails

Preparation: Shake and strain into rocks glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, 1 oz Yogurt Liquor, .5 oz Milk, .5 oz Golden Sesame Honey, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 tsp Matcha Tea

Preparation: Shake and strain into small cocktail glass.

Preparation: Shake and strain over fresh ice into collins glass. Add soda. Garnish with basil.

Preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a footed pilsner glass. Add a few drops of bitters. Garnish with a mint leaf.   *Strawberry & Black Pepper Shrub: -- 1 cup Sliced Strawberries -- 1 cup Granulated Sugar -- 1 cup Champagne Vinegar -- 1 handful of Black Balinese Peppers  Combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. Using a potato masher or a wooden spoon, mash the berries so they release their juices. Stir until the sugar has mostly dissolved and refrigerate overnight. The next day, remove the mixture to a saucepan and heat gently over medium-low heat. Do not bring to a simmer--you simply want to heat the mixture to coax the sugar to dissolve. Strain the shrub through a fine mesh strainer. If desired, strain again through a coffee filter. Refrigerate.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Strawberry & Black Pepper Shrub*, .75 oz Hidalgo La Gitana Manzanilla Sherry, .5 oz Lemon Juice , 1 drops Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Shake with ice in a mixing glass for about 15 seconds to properly chill. Double strain into a small fizz glass over ice.  *Coconut Pistachio Puree: -- .5 lb Pistachios (toasted) -- 1.5 lbs Sugar (144 oz.) -- 11 oz Coconut Milk -- 13 oz Water -- 1 tsp Salt  Toast the pistachios at 250°F for 20 mins. Remove and put in a blender with sugar until well chopped. Combine all the ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil. Let simmer for 20 mins and then remove from the heat. Let cool and place in a large container. Let the mixture sit overnight then strain out the solids. Save the solids to spin in the ice cream maker (if you have one). Spin the solids and add the mixture back into the puree via chinois. Bottle, label and date the syrup (it will keep indefinitely if you freeze it).
Ingredients: 1 oz Mezcal, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .75 oz Coconut Pistachio Puree*, .75 oz Lemon Juice

Ingredients: 1 tsp Grenadine, 1/2 oz Orange juice, 1 tsp Benedictine, 2 oz Gin

Preparation: Shaken slightly. Served over shaved ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnished with turmeric toasted coconut flakes.  *Toasted Coconut Infused Old Potrero -- 750ml Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey -- 2.5 oz Toasted Coconut  Combine all ingredients in a clean container and let sit for 8 hours. Strain through cheesecloth and then funnel back into your Old Potrero bottles. Keeps indefinitely.  **Turmeric Coconut Cream: -- 12 g Fresh Turmeric -- 1 c Water -- 1 c Honey -- 3 tsp Black Pepper -- 12 oz Coconut Milk  Grate fresh turmeric into 1 cup water. Bring to a boil, add 1 cup of honey and stir. Remove from heat and let the mix sit for 1:30 hours. Strain out turmeric and add 3 tsp. ground black pepper. Add 12 oz. coconut milk and stir. Place in an airtight container and keep in the fridge. Use within a week.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey (Toasted Coconut Infused)*, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1.25 oz Turmeric Coconut Cream**

Preparation: Shaken without ice, then with ice and strained into a large coupe. Garnished with candied thyme.  *Beet Thyme Reduction -- 520 grams raw beets  -- 344 grams honey -- 2 oranges peeled (just the peels) -- 2 sprigs of thyme -- pinch of salt  Juice beets, add honey and let dissolve and cook for 15 mins.  Add thyme and simmer for 5 more mins.  Strain through a chinois into a container and then place in the fridge. This makes 1 quart, so multiply as needed. Use within 1 week.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz Beet Thyme Reduction*, .5 oz Licor 43, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .5  Egg White

Preparation: Shaken, poured over fresh ice in highball. Garnish with macadamia nut. Coconut shaved rim.
Ingredients: 2 oz Ypioca Cachaca Prata*, 1 oz Passion fruit juice, 1 oz Condensed milk

Preparation: Shaken.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Chamucos Blanco Tequila, .5 oz Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, .5 oz Thyme Simple Syrup, .5 oz Lime Juice

Preparation: Shaker and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with an Apple Fan.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 oz Old Overholt Rye, .5 oz Demerara Simple Syrup, .5 oz Lemon Juice, .75 oz Fuji Apple Cider

Cocktail Name: Carrier Pigeon (an Airmail with Pink Pigeon)
Preparation: Short shake-strain into champagne flute- top with champagne.  Drop a Luxardo cherry into the flute.
Ingredients: 1 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .5 oz Lime juice, .5 oz Honey

Preparation: Simmer over low heat for 3 hours, double strain with fine sieve.
Ingredients: 1 bottle Red Wine, .3 bottle King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 tbsp Caster Sugar, 2  Lemons, 1 zested Orange, 1 stick Cinnamon, 1 dash Nutmeg, 1  Star Anise

Preparation: Soak 1 chai tea bag in half mug of hot water for 30 seconds, remove the tea bag, add all the ingredients, add more hot water.   Lemon wheel stuffed with 4-5 cloves for garnish.
Ingredients: 1 oz Avua Amburana Cachaça, 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Squeezed Lemon Juice, 1 bag Chai Tea
Notes: Featured in The King's Ginger Winter Warmer Program OND 2015

Preparation: Soak brown sugar cube in Angostura and Orange bitters. Muddle soaked sugar cube into a paste in a rocks glass. Pour 2 oz. Pink Pigeon. Add ice and stir. Garnish with an orange peel and Luxardo Cherry.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 cube Brown Sugar

Preparation: Soak cube in 8 dashes Abbott's Bitter. Drop sugar cube into bottom of flute glass. Stir, Luxardo, gin, and pomegranate cordial. Strain into flute glass. Top with Brachetto. Garnish with small rose, dipped in rose flower water.  *Pomegranate Cordial: -- 48 oz Pomegranate Juice -- 2.5 lbs White Sugar -- 1 lb Turbinado Sugar -- 8 Course Cracked Black Peppercorns -- 2 Cloves -- 5 Allspice Berries -- 1 Tbsp Pomegranate Molasses -- 1 oz Orange Flower Water  Mix all ingredients together in large saucepan. Stir on medium heat until all sugar is dissolved. Strain of spices. Bottle.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .75 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 bsp Pomegranate Cordial*, 1.25 oz Brachetto, 1  Sugar Cube, 8 dash Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters

Preparation: Spray a rocks glass with absinthe, build all other ingredients over cubed ice, garnish with a lemon wheel.
Ingredients: 40 ml Pink Pigeon Rum, 40 ml Pressed apple juice,   Ginger ale,   Absinthe,   Lemon zest

Preparation: Spray of Lemon Verbana oil on the Martini glass. Combine all other ingredients and dry shake for 20 seconds. Add ice to the mixing tin and shake again. Double strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with fresh lemon verbena. Served in a martini.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Creole Shrub, .75 oz Lemon juice, .25 oz Lemon bitters, .5 oz Simple syrup, 1  Egg white

Preparation: Spray the inside of the glass with absinthe, then sugar the external rim of the glass. Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and strain into the glass.
Ingredients: 2 oz Barr Hill Honey Gin, 1 oz Lemon Juice, .25 oz Liquid Alchemist Orgeat, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 bsp Dijon Blue Curaçao

Preparation: Spray vessel with absinthe as a rinse. Build cocktail in a stirring glass. Stir cocktail. Place a large format cube in the vessel. Pour cocktail over large format cube.   To garnish, peel a blood orange skin and express the oils over the cocktail. Grab mint sprigs and slap over the top of hand to express oils, wrap the peel at the base of the mint sprigs, tie off with twine and set on top of large format cube.  *Clarified Coconut Sugar Blood Orange Cordial: -- Blood Oranges -- Agar Agar -- Coconut Sugar  Juice blood oranges. Bring 1/4 of juice to a boil with agar agar. Pour cooked juice into the remaining 3/4 juice. Freeze the juice. Pull the block from the freezer and let drip through cheese cloth and perforated pan creating the clarified juice. Bring the juice together with a rich (2:1) coconut sugar creating a coconut sugar blood orange cordial.
Ingredients: .75 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1.5 oz Bols Genever, .5 oz Clarified Coconut Sugar Blood Orange Cordial*, 1 dash Copper & Kings Absinthe

Preparation: Steam in steaming tin. Pour in Demitasse glass. Top with heavy whipping cream and nutmeg.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pumpkin vodka, .75 oz New York Apple Whisky, .75 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Hot water

Preparation: Step one: Infuse the vodka - Transfer ingredients including 750 ml of Karlsson's vodka to a canning jar or glass container. Close the container. - Shake and rotate every few hours. Let infuse for 24 hours total. - After 24 hours, strain the vodka through a cheesecloth or nutmilk bag. - Transfer the vodka to a glass bottle. Store in the refrigerator or freezer until use.  Step two: Make the martini - Stir 2-3 oz, depending on preference, of the infused vodka with ice. - Strain into a chilled martini glass. - Add pickled onions and peppers.
Ingredients: 750 ml Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 5 sprigs Dill, 2 cloves Crushed Garlic, 1  Lemon Peel, 1 tbsp Whole Peppercorns

Preparation: Stir all 3 ingredients continuously in an ice-filled glass, approximately 20 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass with one large ice cube.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Maurin Quina, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter
Notes: For a slightly sweeter version, replace Luxardo Bitter with Aperol.

Preparation: Stir all ingredients and pour over 2-inch single ice cube. Garnish with birch smoked sea salt rim and bow tie orange peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Mezcal, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Chinato, 1 oz Campari, 2 dash Rhubarb Bitters, 2 dash Orange Bitters
Garnish: Birch Smoked Sea Salt Rim, Bow Tie Orange Peel

Preparation: Stir all ingredients except for Absinthe and Orange Flower. Strain over a chunk/sphere of ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint, with 3 drops of Orange Flower.
Ingredients: 1 oz Junipero Gin, 1 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, 1 oz Amaro Sibilla, .25 oz Simple syrup, 1 rinse St. George Absinthe, 3 drops Fee Brothers Orange Flower Water

Preparation: Stir all ingredients over cubed ice and then strain over large rock while incorporating the cream soda. Garnish with Italian baking spice infused olive and cherry.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, .5 oz Krogstad Aquavit, 1 bsp Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 1 dash Orange Cream Citrate, 1.25 oz Almond Cream Soda

Preparation: Stir all ingredients over ice and strain into a footed rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.  *Equal parts lemon and celery bitters in a dasher bottle.
Ingredients: 1.75 oz Bombay Dry Gin, .75 oz Dubonnet Rouge, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Lemon-Celery Bitters*

Preparation: Stir all ingredients together, strain into a chilled large rocks glass, no ice. Twist a zest of lemon above the drink, dip it once and then discard.
Ingredients: 1 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Old Overholt Straight Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Rittenhouse Straight Rye Whisky, 1 bsp Rich Demerara Simple Syrup, 3 dash Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Stir all ingredients until well chilled, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel with oils squeeze over cocktail.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, 1 bsp Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, .75 oz BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), .25 oz Benedictine, 1 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Apple Brandy, .25 oz Benedictine, .25 oz Yellow Chartreuse, 1 dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure, 1 dash Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Cocchi Americano, .75 oz Dolin Rouge Vermouth, 1 dash Bittermens Hopped Grapefruit Bitters

Preparation: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a double rocks glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon twist and orange twist.
Ingredients: .5 oz H by HINE, .5 oz Rye Whiskey, .5 oz Bourbon, .5 oz Calvados, 1 tsp Demerara Syrup, 2 dash Angostura Bitters, 1 dash Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters

Preparation: Stir and garnish lemon peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Mezcal, .75 oz Montenegro Amaro Liquore Italiano, .75 oz Calisaya Liqueur, 2 dash Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6

Preparation: Stir and pour over ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Cocchi Americano Rosa, 1 dash Angostura Bitters, 3 drops Bittercube Cherry Bark Vanilla Bitters

Preparation: Stir and strain into a chilled coupe.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, 1 dash Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Pontarlier Anis

Preparation: Stir and strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass. Garnish with a clove(2) studded orange coin.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .5 oz La Quintinye Vermouth Rouge, .25 oz Pedro Ximenez Sherry, .25 oz Cannella Cinnamon Cordial, 1 dash Angostura bitters

Preparation: Stir and strain into an old fashioned glass with a large ice cube.
Ingredients: .5 oz Old Forester Bonded Bourbon, .5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Rock & Rye, 1 oz Cocchi Americano Rosa,   Activated Charcoal

Preparation: Stir and strain into an old fashioned glass. Large ice cube.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz Quady Muscat Wine
Notes: Aged for 3 months in a used Rye Barrel that previously held a cocktail with Tequila and All Spice. Can also be made to order without barrel aging it.

Preparation: Stir and strain into stem. Garnish torched star anise and discarded lemon peel.
Ingredients: 2 oz Old Tom Gin, .75 oz Carpano Antica, 1 spoon Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 2 dash Bittercube cherry bark bitters

Preparation: Stir and strain over ice.

Notes: *Steep 3 Doug Fir Tip Tea bags in 750 ml riesling for 2 hours. Add 500 m  **Soak seaweed in vodka to taste

Preparation: Stir and strain up into cocktail glass.

Preparation: Stir and strain.

Notes: Aged in used Salt Washed Bourbon Barrel for 4 months. Can also be made to order without barrel aging it.

Preparation: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.
PreparationDE: Über Eis gerührt, in ein gekühltes Glas geseiht, garniert und serviert.
PreparationIT: Mescolate su ghiaccio, filtrate in un bicchiere freddo, guarnite e servite.
Ingredients: 1 twist Orange peel, 1 Maraschino cherry,3 cubes Ice, 1 dash Angostura bitters, 1/2 oz Blended Bourbon, 3/4 oz Sweet Vermouth

Preparation: Stir and strain. Hoshizaki ice.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz House-made Slivovitz (Plum Brandy), 1 oz Chamomile Tea-Infused Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 3 dash Peychaud's Bitters

Preparation: Stir for about 20 seconds with ice and then Strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz C. Drouin Calvados Selection, .75 oz Spirit Works Sloe Gin, .5 oz Bonal, 4 drops Black Salt Tincture

Preparation: Stir gently and garnish with a lemon twist.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Junipero Gin, .75 oz Dry Vermouth, .75 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, 1 dash The Bitter Truth Orange Bitters

Preparation: Stir in a mixing glass to chill down and serve up in a coupe with a lemon zest garnish.

Preparation: Stir in a mixing glass with ice; strain into a coupe glass; garnish with orange and lemon zest.

Preparation: Stir in mixing glass and serve in a chilled coupe.

Preparation: Stir ingredients and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Notes: This cocktail is meant to be spirit forward but clean allowing the Nikka to shine through and the sherry to push the more round flavors of the whisky. Bushido translates to "the way of the warrior" according to the Japanese Code of Honor.

Preparation: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice then strain into a chilled cocktail coupe.

Preparation: Stir ingredients in a mixing glass over an ice sphere(if available) then strain and serve into a chilled cocktail glass filled with the same ice sphere. Garnish with lemon balm and grapefruit peel.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Pisco, .75 oz Luxardo Amaro Abano, .75 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur

Preparation: Stir ingredients in glass over an ice sphere.

Preparation: Stir ingredients over cracked ice. With a julep strainer, pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Once poured, top with lemon foam.  *Dry Vermouth Infusion: -- 1.5 oz Togarashi Spice -- 3 Vanilla Beans -- 2 bags of Green Tea Place ingredients in cheesecloth to steep in a bell jar with 1 bottle of Dolin Dry vermouth for 2 days.  Remove the infusion elements and refrigerate the infusion.  **Lemon Foam: -- 1 bsp Lemon Juice -- 1 bsp Simple Syrup -- 1 Egg White  Place ingredients into a shaker tin and whip with a bar whisk into a foam.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, .5 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, .75 oz Dry Vermouth Infusion*, 2 dash Bittermens Burlesque Bitters, 1 top Lemon Foam

Preparation: Stir ingredients together and strain into an absinthe-rinsed coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist/peel.

Preparation: Stir ingredients with ice and strain into Canadian Glencairn glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz H by HINE, .75 oz Wild Turkey 101 Rye, .5 oz Bin 27 Port, .25 oz Yellow Chartreuse, 2 dash Mole Bitters

Preparation: Stir IPA and Luxardo in a tumbler. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Preparation: Stir over 1 large rock. Garnish with zest of an orange peel.

Preparation: Stir over 1 large rock. Garnish with zest of an orange peel.

Preparation: Stir over cubed/vintage ice, double strain into a small chilled martini glass. Garnish with a black olive on a pick.

Preparation: Stir over ice and serve in a rocks glass.

Preparation: Stir over ice and strain into a Nick and Nora glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Old Tom Gin, 1 oz Lustau East India Solera, .5 oz Grand Poppy Liqueur

Preparation: Stir over ice for at least 30 seconds, strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Preparation: Stir the cherry juice, Maraschino, bitters and Amaro in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a cocktail coupe and top with Champagne. Garnish with a sprig of thyme.

Preparation: Stir the first three ingredients and the sea salt tincture over ice. Strain into a coupe glass and add licorice-infused Angostura Bitters. Garnish with 3 brandied cherries.

Preparation: Stir the first two ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled wine glass. Top with chilled wine, stir and serve.

Preparation: Stir the ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice, strain and serve over ice into an old fashioned glass.

Preparation: Stir the ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice, then strain and serve into a chilled cocktail glass.

Preparation: Stir to 35 °F, strain into a double rocks glass over an angled ice wedge. Garnish with orange peel.

Notes: Featured on Speed Rack 2015 SF Speed City Takeover Baseball Card.

Preparation: Stir with ice and serve in a Nick and Nora glass (slimmer version of a coupe).

Notes: *Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth- Infused with Porcini Mushroom

Preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a fresh cherry tree blossom.
Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Dolin Dry Vermouth, .25 oz Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 6 dash Celery Bitters

Preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: 1 oz Charbay Ruby Red Grapefruit Vodka, 1 oz Vya Dry Vermouth, .75 oz Hophead Vodka, .25 oz Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup

Cocktail Name: Iron Fist in a Velvet Glove
Preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Ingredients: 1.25 oz Lillet Rose, .75 oz BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, .75 oz Prata Cachaca, .25 oz Velvet Falernum

Preparation: Stir with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Preparation: Stir with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass over small ice cubes. Garnish with an orange twist.

Preparation: Stir with ice until cold; strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express and garnish with lemon.

Notes: Photo credit: Douglas M. Ford, cold-glass.com

Preparation: Stir with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Preparation: Stir, fine strain into a collins glass over ice. Top with soda. Garnish with grapefruit peel.

Preparation: Stir, serve on a large rock with an orange twist garnish.

Preparation: Stir, strain into an absinthe rinsed coupe. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Preparation: Stir, strain, and serve straight up.

Preparation: Stir, strain, and serve straight up. Express zest and garnish.

Preparation: Stir, tastes great up or over a large ice cube with an orange twist.

Preparation: Stir. Add ice cube.  *Barley Tea-Infused Nikka Coffey Grain Whiskey: -- 10 g. Barley Tea (1 package) -- 750 mls. Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky In a cambro, empty a bottle of Nikka Coffey Grain Whiskey, add 1 package of barley tea. Steep for 30 minutes at room temperature. Strain and store.

Preparation: Stir. Strain into martini glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

Preparation: Stir. Strain into Nick & Nora glass. Mist of Pipe Tobacco Tincture.

Preparation: Stir. Use large ice cube.

Preparation: To make simple syrup, mix equal parts hot water and sugar until sugar is dissolved. Place mint in bottom of glass. Add ice and remaining ingredients except club soda then stir. Top with club soda and garnish with a mint sprig.
Ingredients: 2 oz Pink Pigeon Rum, .25 oz Simple syrup, 2 oz Cranberry juice, 1 fill Club soda,   Mint leaves, 1 whole Lime, Juiced

Preparation: Toast spices and set aside. Bring cranberry juice to a simmer. Tie the spices and orange peel in cheesecloth and add them to the cranberry juice. Let this simmer for about 30 minutes. Remove the spice sachet and add the other liquid ingredients. Serve warm or chilled with orange wheels as a garnish. (The magic of punches is that you can adjust them to your liking as you make them, so please play around with different juices and proportions.)
Ingredients: 750 ml Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 5 oz Pomegranate Juice, 9 oz Cranberry Juice, 9 oz Aperol, 4 oz Simple Syrup (equal parts sugar and water), 3  Star Anise, 5  Cloves, 4  Allspice Berries, 3  Cinnamon Sticks, 2 oz Orange Peel
Notes: With the winter months upon us, you are sure to find a need for a great punch recipe. Punches are very versatile and always a hit at parties. This punch can be served chilled or warm, depending on your taste. If served chilled, we recommend having a bottle of champagne on ice next to the punch bowl to offer your guests the option of topping their punch off with a bit of bubbles.

Preparation: Top with Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon. Build in a collins glass full of ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel and mint sprig.
Ingredients: 1 oz No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 oz Dolin Rouge Vermouth, .5 oz The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange, .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .25 oz Chareau Liqueur, .5 oz Fresh Lemon Juice, 1 top Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon

Preparation: Top with Grapefruit soda. Shake and strain into ice filled glass.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, .5 oz Rocoto passion fruit reduction, .5 oz Fresh lime juice, .5 oz Simple syrup
Notes: Served at the 7 Pisco Brands: 14 Cocktails

Preparation: Topped with about 4 oz. of LaCroix Pamplemousse. Garnish with grapefruit twist and thyme.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Luxardo Bitter Bianco, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, .5 oz Junipero Gin

Preparation: Use an empty bottle of 750ml capacity and combine together 12 ounces - 360 ml of each of the two liqueurs and store in the freezer. Serve very cold in a small cordial glass without ice.
Ingredients: 1 oz Luxardo Limoncello, 1 oz Herbal Liqueur
Notes: Shake the bottle containing the mixture before serving.

Preparation: Using a grater, slice 1 peel of grapefruit into a double old-fashioned glass, angling into the glass in order to get the expressed citrus. Then add Cinnamon-Clove Syrup and 3 large ice cubes.  Separately, in a large mixing glass full of ice, pour in Chinaco Anejo Tequila. Using a barspoon, stir for 28-33 rotations. Strain tequila into prepared glass. Add 4 drops of Bittermens Hellfire Bitters. Garnish and enjoy.  *Cinnamon-Clove Syrup:   -- 2 C Water -- 1 C Demarea Sugar -- 4-5 Cinnamon Sticks -- 7-9 Cloves  Combine Water and Demarea in a pot and bring to a simmer until the sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat. Add Cinnamon Sticks and Cloves and let steep. Leave at room temperature, overnight. Once cooled, strain into a squeeze bottle and refrigerate.
Ingredients: 2 oz Chinaco Anejo Tequila, 1 tsp Cinnamon-Clove Syrup*, 4 drops Bittermens Hellfire Habanero Shrub Bitters, 1 peel Grapefruit

Preparation: Warm and flame H by Hine VSOP Fine Champagne in metal mug like a Blue Blazer without the tossing back and forth. Douse flame of heated brandy with cacao, top with foamed cream. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
Ingredients: 2 oz H by HINE, 1 oz Tempus Fugit Creme de Cacao, 1 oz Cream (steamed as for a cappuccino)

Preparation: Wet half of the rim of a 13 oz. rocks glass with Benedictine. Shake off the excess Benedictine to avoid clumping on the rim and dip it into the peanut butter powder. Flick the glass to shake the excess powder off. Place the glass in a cooler to chill the glass. In a frozen mixing glass combine all liquid ingredients with equal parts cracked ice and whole hard ice. Stir the cocktail for 45 seconds. Remove the glass from the cooler and place a 2 in. hard ice cube in it. Double strain the cocktail into the glass. Spritz the cocktail with both of the twists. Make sure to release all the essential oils into the cocktail. Discard the twists.
Ingredients: 1 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 oz Cognac, .5 oz Benedictine, 1 tincture Angostura Bitters, 1 tincture Peychaud's Bitters, 1 pc Lemon Twist, 1 pc Orange Twist,   Peanut Butter Powder

Preparation: Wet shake all ingredients except grapefruit soda, pour over ice and top with grapefruit soda. Rim glass with grapefruit demerara. Add dehydrated grapefruit wheel and slice of fresh root ginger for garnish.
Ingredients: 1.5 oz Pusser's Blue Label Rum , .5 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, .5 oz Ginger Syrup, .25 oz Lime Juice, 1 top Homemade Pink Grapefruit Soda
Garnish: Dehydrated Grapefruit Wheel, Fresh Root Ginger Slice

Preparation: Whip / Dump / Crushed
Ingredients: 1 oz King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 oz Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, .75 oz Pineapple Gum, .75 oz Lemon Juice, 2 dash Angostura Bitters

Preparation: Whisk ingredients in birdie (or tin). Pour into coupe glass and top with Prosecco (1 oz). Garnish with dehydrated orange wheel. Spray orange flower from atomizer.
Ingredients: .5 oz Junipero Gin, .5 oz Luxardo Bitter, .5 oz Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, .5 oz Dry Vermouth, 1 scoop Orange Sorbet, 2 drops Bittermens Orange Cream Citrate

Ingredients: 2 cups Boiling water, 6 packages Raspberry Jello packages, 1.25 cup Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, .25 cup Fresh lime juice, .5 cup Cold water

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl. Mix well.
Ingredients: 12 bottles H by HINE, 4 bottles Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, 1 bottle King's Ginger Liqueur, 1 bottle Luxardo Aperitivo, 4 bottles Lemon juice
Notes: Note* this is for a 6-8 quart punch bowl

Preparation: Muddle Okinawa sugar with bitters. Add whisky and stir. Top with soda.
Ingredients: 2 oz Nikka Whisky Taketsuru, .5 oz Okinawa sugar, .5 oz Soda, 2 dash Orange Bitters, 2 dash Old Fashioned Bitters
Notes: Classic Lolita is inspired by an Old Fashioned, substituting Nikka Japanese Whisky and the addition of okinawa sugar adds a nice character. Okinawa sugar is more like a molasses and like its name, it comes from the island of Okinawa. Lolita is a Victorian style that was very popular in Japan for some time, the look was very 'Old Fashioned' hence the name for the cocktail.

Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a large pitcher and mix well. Store in fridge over night to let all the flavors meld together.
Ingredients: 2 oz Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 2 oz Bloody mix*, 1  Caper berry, 1  Celery stalk, 1  Cherry tomato, 1  Pepperoncini, 1  Pickled okra, 1  Cocktail onion, 1  Pipparas Pepper, 1  Lemon slice, 1  Jalapeno stuffed olive

Cholula hot sauce - 2.5 oz. fresh lemon juice - 1.5 oz.fresh lime juice - 2 Tbsp. Pickled okra brine - 1 tsp. Ground celery seed - 2 tsp. Fresh ground black pepper - 2 tsp. Kosher salt - 2 tsp. Hipster dust

Preparation: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
PreparationDE: Reiben Sie den Rand des Glases mit der Limettenscheibe, damit das Salz daran haftet. Achten Sie darauf, dass nur der äußere Rand angefeuchtet wird und streuen Sie das Salz darauf. Das Salz sollte sich auf den Lippen des Genießers befinden und niemals in den Cocktail einmischen. Die anderen Zutaten mit Eis schütteln und vorsichtig in das Glas geben.
PreparationIT: Strofina il bordo del bicchiere con la fetta di lime per far aderire il sale.  Avere cura di inumidire solo il bordo esterno e cospargere di sale.  Il sale dovrebbe presentarsi alle labbra del bevitore e non mescolarsi mai al cocktail.  Shakerare gli altri ingredienti con ghiaccio, quindi versarli delicatamente nel bicchiere.
Ingredients: Salt, 1 oz Lime juice, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 1/2 oz Tequila

Ingredients: Club soda, 2 oz Cranberry juice, 2 oz Orange juice, 2 oz Strawberry schnapps

Preparation: Stirr. Grnish with maraschino cherry.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un mixing glass. Mescolate.  Guarnire con una ciliegia al maraschino.
Ingredients: 1 Maraschino cherry, 1 cl Apple juice, 3 cl Grapefruit juice, 4 cl Orange juice

Preparation: Fill a tall glass with ice. Layer the Finlandia Vodka, lemon and apple juices, Pisang Ambon, and top up with lemonade. Stir slightly and garnish with a spiralled cucumber skin and a red cherry. The cucumber provides zest and looks attractive. This drink, created by Timo Haimi, took first prize in the 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.
PreparationDE: Füllen Sie ein hohes Glas mit Eis. Legen Sie den Finlandia Wodka, Zitronen- und Apfelsäfte, Pisang Ambon und geben Sie Limonade dazu. Leicht umrühren und mit einer spiralförmigen Gurkenhaut und einer roten Kirsche garnieren. Die Gurke sorgt für Schärfe und sieht attraktiv aus. Dieses von Timo Haimi kreierte Getränk erhielt 1991 den ersten Preis beim Finlandia Wodka Long Drink Wettbewerb.
PreparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere alto di ghiaccio.  Versare la Vodka, succhi di limone, mela, Pisang Ambon o un liquore alla banana e completare con la limonata.  Mescolare leggermente e guarnire con una buccia di cetriolo a spirale e una ciliegia rossa.  Il cetriolo fornisce la scorza e sembra attraente.  Questa bevanda, creata da Timo Haimi, ha vinto il primo premio nel 1991 Finlandia Vodka Long Drink Competition.
Ingredients: Lemonade, 1/2 part Lemon juice, 6 parts Apple juice, 1 part Pisang Ambon, 3 parts Vodka

Preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere highball riempito di cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolare bene.
Ingredients: 3 oz Orange juice, 2 oz Peach nectar, 1/2 oz Dark rum

Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti.Agitare bene.Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail.
Ingredients: 1 Egg white, 1 oz Kahlua, 2 oz Dark rum

Preparation: Shake together all the ingredients and strain into a cold glass.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten vermengen und in ein kaltes Glas abseihen.
PreparationIT: Shakerare insieme tutti gli ingredienti e filtrare in un bicchiere freddo.
Ingredients: 1/2 shot Vermouth, 1/2 shot Gin

Preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients (except mint) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add the sprig of mint and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Minze) mit Eis mischen und schütteln und in ein old-fashioned Glas über Eiswürfel abseihen. Den Minzzweig dazugeben und servieren.
PreparationIT: Unire e scuotere tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la menta) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere vecchio stile su cubetti di ghiaccio.Aggiungere il rametto di menta e servire.
Ingredients: 1 Mint, 1 Egg white, 1 tsp Sugar, 1 tblsp Lime juice, 1/2 tsp Triple sec, 1/2 oz Light rum

Preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Mescolare bene.
Ingredients: 2 dashes Orange bitters, 1 oz Dry Vermouth, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, 1/2 oz Scotch

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 1 oz Lemon juice, 1 oz Triple sec, 1 oz Applejack

Preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den mit Eis gefüllten Cocktailshaker geben. Gut schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit einer Kirsche garnieren.
PreparationIT: Aggiungi tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker pieno di ghiaccio.  Shakerare bene e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.  Guarnire con una ciliegia.
Ingredients: 1.5 cl Maraschino liqueur, 1.5 cl Lemon juice, 4.5 cl Gin

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Muskatnuss darüber streuen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio e filtrare il contenuto in un bicchiere da cocktail. Cospargere di noce moscata e servire.
Ingredients: Nutmeg, 2 oz Light cream, 1/2 oz White Creme de Cacao, 1/2 oz Gin

Preparation: Combine and shake all ingredients with ice, strain contents into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis mischen und schütteln, Inhalt in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Unire e scuotere tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare il contenuto in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 1 oz Pineapple juice, 1 oz Dry Vermouth, 1/2 oz Blended whiskey

Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the twist of lemon peel and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Zitronenschale) mit Eis schütteln und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit der Drehung der Zitronenschale garnieren und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la buccia di limone) con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail.Completare con la scorza di limone e servire.
Ingredients: 1 twist Lemon peel, 1/2 tsp Lemon juice, 1/2 tsp Blackberry brandy, 1 oz Bourbon, 1 oz Dry Vermouth

Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 2 dashes Bitters, 1/2 oz Gin, 1/2 tsp Sweet Vermouth

Preparation: Mix. Serve over ice.
Ingredients: 4 parts Pineapple juice, 4 parts Orange juice, 1 part Grenadine

Preparation: Mix and fill up with soda water. Drunk by finns on a sunny day any time of the year and day.
PreparationDE: Mischen und mit Sodawasser auffüllen. Getrunken von Finnen an einem sonnigen Tag zu jeder Jahreszeit und an jedem Tag.
PreparationIT: Mescolare e riempire con acqua di seltz. Bevuto dai finlandesi in una giornata di sole in qualsiasi momento dell'anno e del giorno.
Ingredients: Soda water, 1 dash Lime juice, 4 cl Vodka

Preparation: Build into a suiting glass, with no ice. Cream on top if wanted. Served directly.
PreparationDE: In ein passendes Glas geben, ohne Eis. Auf Wunsch mit Sahne überziehen. Direkt serviert.
PreparationIT: Incorpora un bicchiere adatto, senza ghiaccio.  Crema in cima se lo si desidera.  Servito direttamente.
Ingredients: Cream, 4 cl Hot Coffee, 1/2 Frangelico, 1 cl Baileys irish cream, 1 cl Kahlua

Preparation: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar
PreparationDE: Gießen Sie den Wodka und die Sahne über einige Eiswürfel in ein hohes Glas und füllen Sie ihn mit Saft. Damit es voll ist, verzieren Sie die Oberseite des Glases mit einer Grenadine und Zucker.
PreparationIT: Versare la vodka e la crema su alcuni cubetti di ghiaccio in un bicchiere alto e riempire di succo.  Per renderlo bello, versare nella parte superiore del bicchiere un po’ di granatina e nei bordi mettere un po’ di zucchero
Ingredients: Orange juice, 1 cl Creme de Banane, 2 cl Vodka

Preparation: Layer the Kahlua, Sambucca and Grand Marnier into a shot glas in that order. Better than B-52
PreparationDE: Schichte die Kahlua, Sambucca und Grand Marnier in dieser Reihenfolge in ein Schnapsglas ein. Besser als B-52
PreparationIT: Metti Kahlua, Sambuca e Grand Marnier in un bicchierino in quest'ordine.
Ingredients: 1/3 shot Grand Marnier, 1/3 shot Sambuca, 1/3 shot Kahlua

Preparation: Layer ingredients into a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.
PreparationDE: Zutaten in ein Schnapsglas schichten. Mit einem Rührstab servieren.
PreparationIT: Metti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere da shot a strati.  Servire con una paletta.
Ingredients: 1/4 Kahlua, 1/3 Grand Marnier, 1/3 Baileys irish cream

Preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice and strain
PreparationDE: In Mischglas mit Eis verrühren und abseihen.
PreparationIT: Mescolare nel mixing glass con ghiaccio e filtrare
Ingredients: 1 oz Sweet Vermouth, 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Green Chartreuse, 1 dash Orange Bitters

Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Sour Glas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti.Filtrare in un bicchiere sour.Agitare bene.
Ingredients: 1 Egg white, 1/2 tsp Grenadine, 1 tsp Lemon juice, 1 oz Triple sec, 1/2 oz Gin

Preparation: Pour ingredients into 1 ounce shot glass
PreparationIT: Versare gli ingredienti in un bicchierino da shot.
Ingredients: 1/2 oz Goldschlager, 1/2 oz Irish cream

Preparation: Pour peach purée into chilled flute, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.
PreparationDE: Pfirsichpüree in das gekühlte Sektglas gießen, Sekt hinzufügen. Vorsichtig umrühren.
PreparationIT: Versare la purea di pesche in una flûte fredda, aggiungere lo spumante.
Ingredients: 1 oz Peach schnapps, 6 oz Champagne

Preparation: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.
PreparationDE: Füllen Sie das Glas mit zerstoßenem Eis. Den Gin, den Zitronensaft und den Sirup dazugeben. Rühren Sie um und gießen Sie dann Brombeerlikör kreisförmig darüber, um einen Marmoriereffekt zu erzielen. Mit zwei Brombeeren und einer Zitronenscheibe garnieren.
PreparationIT: Riempi il bicchiere con ghiaccio tritato.  Aggiungi gin, succo di limone e sciroppo semplice.  Mescolare e poi versare il liquore alla mora in modo circolare per creare un effetto marmorizzato.  Guarnire con due more e una fetta di limone.
Ingredients: 1.5 cl Creme de Mure, 1 cl Sugar syrup, 1.5 cl lemon juice, 4 cl Gin

Preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail.Mescolare bene.
Ingredients: 2 dashes Bitters, 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth, 1/2 oz Sweet Vermouth, 1/2 oz Scotch

Preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin, triple sec, Curacao, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the lemon twist and the cherry.
PreparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Crushed Ice gefüllt ist, den Gin, Triple Sec, Curacao und Bitter vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen und mit Zitronenschale und Kirsche garnieren.
PreparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con ghiaccio tritato, unisci il gin, il triple sec, il Curacao e il bitter.Mescolare bene.Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e guarnire con la scorza di limone e la ciliegia.
Ingredients: 1 twist Lemon peel, 1 Maraschino cherry, 2 dashes Bitters, 1/2 oz Blue Curacao, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 1/2 oz Gin

Preparation: Combine ingredients with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
PreparationIT: Unisci gli ingredienti con il ghiaccio e mescola finché non si saranno raffreddati. Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata.
Ingredients: 1 Maraschino Cherry, 3 dashes Angostura Bitters, 1/4 oz Maraschino Liqueur, 1 oz Dry Vermouth, 2 oz Rye Whiskey

Preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, bitters, and maraschino liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the cherry.
PreparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, den Gin, Wermut, Bitter und Maraschino-Likör vermengen. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen und mit der Kirsche garnieren.
PreparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire il gin, il vermouth, il bitter e il liquore al maraschino.Mescolare bene.Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e guarnire con la ciliegia.
Ingredients: 1 Maraschino cherry, 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur, 2 dashes Bitters, 1/2 oz Dry Vermouth, 2 oz Gin

Preparation: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with 1 slice of pineapple and one cherry.
PreparationDE: In einem Mixer oder Shaker zubereiten, in einem Highball-Glas "On the Rocks" servieren. Mit 1 Scheibe Ananas und einer Kirsche garnieren.
PreparationIT: Preparare in un frullatore o uno shaker, servire in un bicchiere highball con ghiaccio.Guarnire con 1 fetta di ananas e una ciliegia.
Ingredients: 1 cl Grenadine, 1 cl Lemon juice, 6 cl Passion fruit juice, 10 cl Pineapple juice

Preparation: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.
PreparationDE: Schütteln Sie die Zutaten mit Eis. In ein Glas abseihen, mit Sekt übergießen.
PreparationIT: Shakerare e versare gli ingredienti con ghiaccio.  Filtrare in un bicchiere, completare con spumante.
Ingredients: 1 top Prosecco, 1 dash Lime Juice, 6 cl Pineapple Juice, 1.5 cl Galliano, 4.5 cl Rum

Preparation: Mix ingredients in a warmed mug and stir.
PreparationDE: Die Zutaten in einem erwärmten Becher mischen und umrühren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare gli ingredienti in una tazza calda e mescola.
Ingredients: 1 oz Cherry Heering, 1 oz Green Chartreuse, 4 oz Hot Chocolate

Preparation: Half fill the glass with ice cubes. Crush the wormwood and add to ice. Pour rum, scotch and butters, then serve!
PreparationIT: Riempire a metà il bicchiere con cubetti di ghiaccio. Schiacciare l'assenzio e aggiungerlo al ghiaccio. Versare rum, scotch e burro, quindi servire!
Ingredients: Ice, 1 Fresh Wormwood, 3 drops Bitters, 1/2 shot Scotch, 1 shot 151 proof rum

Preparation: Stir sloe gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
PreparationDE: Sloe Gin und Wermut mit Eis verrühren und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Die Zitronenschale hinzufügen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare il prugnolo e il vermouth con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Aggiungere la scorza di limone e servire.
Ingredients: 1 twist Lemon peel, 1/2 oz Sloe gin, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth

Preparation: Layer in a 2 oz shot glass or pony glass
PreparationDE: In einem 6 cl. Schnapsglas oder Ponyglas schichten.
PreparationIT: Versa in un bicchierino da 60gr o in un bicchiere da shot.
Ingredients: 1/2 oz Goldschlager, 1/2 oz Jägermeister, 1/2 oz Midori melon liqueur

Preparation: This is a layered shot. First pour the Bailey's into the shot glass. Then take an upside down spoon and touch it to the inside wall of the glass. Carefully add the Kahlua. Repeat this process for the Sambuca. If done properly, the alcohol will stay separated and resemble a bumble bee. Enjoy!!!
PreparationDE: Dies ist ein mehrschichtiges Getränk. Zuerst gießt man die Bailey's in das Schnapsglas. Nehmen Sie dann einen umgedrehten Löffel und berühren Sie ihn an der Innenwand des Glases. Füge das Kahlua vorsichtig hinzu. Wiederholen Sie diesen Vorgang für den Sambuca. Bei richtiger Anwendung bleibt der Alkohol getrennt und ähnelt einer Hummel. Genießt es!!!!!!
PreparationIT: Questo è uno scatto a strati.  Per prima cosa, versa il Bailey's nel bicchierino.  Quindi prendi un cucchiaio capovolto e toccalo sulla parete interna del vetro.  Aggiungi con attenzione il Kahlua.  Ripeti questo processo per la Sambuca.  Se fatto correttamente, l'alcol rimarrà separato e assomiglierà a un calabrone
Ingredients: 1/3 oz Sambuca, 1/3 oz Kahlua, 1/3 oz Baileys irish cream

Preparation: Layer in order into a shot glass.
PreparationIT: Versare a strati nell'ordine di ingrediente
Ingredients: 1/4 Peach schnapps, 1/4 Orange juice, 1/4 Banana liqueur, 1/4 Vodka

Preparation: Mix all ingredients, and pour over ice.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mischen und über Eis gießen.
PreparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti e versare su un bicchiere con del ghiaccio.
Ingredients: 2 oz Sour mix, 2 wedges Lime, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 2 oz Southern Comfort

Preparation: Mix all ingredients together. Slowly and gently. Works best if ice is added to punch bowl and soda's are very cold.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten miteinander vermengen. Langsam und sanft. Funktioniert am besten, wenn Eis in die Bowle gegeben wird und die Soda sehr kalt ist.
PreparationIT: Mescola tutti gli ingredienti insieme.  Lentamente e delicatamente.  Funziona meglio se si aggiunge ghiaccio alla ciotola del punch e se le bibite sono molto fredde.
Ingredients: 1 pint Rum, 1 small Bottle Lemon juice, 2 l Surge, 2 l Mountain Dew, 1 fifth Smirnoff red label Vodka, 1 fifth Everclear

Preparation: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
PreparationDE: Unter leichtem Rühren alle Zutaten in ein Highball-Glas geben. Garnieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolando delicatamente, versare tutti gli ingredienti nel bicchiere highball.
Ingredients: 1 wedge Lime, 2-3 drops Tabasco sauce, 1/2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 dash Lemon juice, 3 oz Tomato juice, 1/2 oz Vodka

Preparation: Pour vodka and curacao over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, top with the cherry, and serve.
PreparationDE: Gießen Sie Wodka und Curacao in einem Highball-Glas über Eis. Mit Limonade füllen, mit der Kirsche verzieren und servieren.
PreparationIT: Versare la vodka e il curacao in un bicchiere highball. Aggiungi cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con la limonata, guarnisci con la ciliegia e servi.
Ingredients: Cherry, Lemonade, 1 oz Blue Curacao, 1 oz Vodka

Preparation: Shake juice of lemon, powdered sugar, blended whiskey, and egg white with cracked ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.
PreparationDE: Den Saft von Zitrone, Puderzucker, gemischtem Whiskey und Eiweiß mit zerkleinertem Eis schütteln und in ein Whisky Sour Glas abseihen. Die Zitronenscheibe dazugeben, mit der Kirsche garnieren und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare il succo di limone, lo zucchero a velo, il whisky miscelato e l'albume con ghiaccio tritato e filtrare in un bicchiere da whisky sour.Aggiungere la fetta di limone, guarnire con la ciliegia e servire.
Ingredients: 1 Cherry, 1 slice Lemon, 1 Egg white, 1 tsp Powdered sugar, Juice of 1/2 Lemon, 2 oz Blended whiskey

Preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Shaker mit Eiswürfeln geben. Gut schütteln. In ein gekühltes Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit einer Zitronenscheibe und einer Maraschinokirsche garnieren. Ohne Strohhalm servieren.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Agitare bene.  Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata.  Guarnire con una scorza di limone e una ciliegia al maraschino.  Servire senza cannuccia.
Ingredients: 1 Cherry, 2 dashes Orange bitters, 1/4 tsp Lemon juice, 1/4 tsp Maraschino liqueur, 2 oz Gin

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 1 tblsp Light cream, 1/2 tsp Cherry brandy, 1/4 oz Light rum

Preparation: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.
PreparationDE: Geben Sie alle Zutaten in ein mit Eis gefülltes Collins-Glas. Mit Limettenkeil garnieren.
PreparationIT: Mettere tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere Collins pieno di ghiaccio. Guarnire con uno spicchio di lime.
Ingredients: Coca-Cola, Juice of 1/2 Lime, 2 oz Light rum

Preparation: Fill tall glass with ice cubes. Add rum. Rub cut edge of lime on rim of glass then squeeze juice into glass. Fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with lime slice. Enjoy!
PreparationDE: Füllen Sie das hohe Glas mit Eiswürfeln. Füge Rum hinzu. Reiben Sie die Schnittkante der Limette auf den Glasrand und drücken Sie den Saft in das Glas. Mit Coca-Cola füllen. Mit Limettenscheibe garnieren. Viel Spaß!
PreparationIT: Riempi un bicchiere alto con cubetti di ghiaccio.  Aggiungi il rum.  Strofinare il bordo tagliato di lime sul bordo del bicchiere, quindi spremere il succo in un bicchiere.  Riempi di Coca-Cola.  Guarnire con una fetta di lime.
Ingredients: Ice, 1 fill Coca-Cola, Squeeze Lime, 1-2 shot Dark rum

Preparation: Fill mug almost to top with coffee.Add milk, triple sec and brandy. Stir.
PreparationDE: Füllen Sie die Tasse fast bis zum Rand mit Kaffee, fügen Sie Milch, Triple Sec und Brandy hinzu. Rühren.
PreparationIT: Riempi la tazza quasi fino in cima con il caffè.  Aggiungi latte, triple sec e brandy.  Agitare.
Ingredients: Brandy, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 1/2 oz Milk, Coffee

Preparation: Pour 1oz of Spiced Rum into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Ginger Ale.
PreparationDE: Geben Sie 3 cl. Spiced Rum in ein Highball-Glas mit Eis. Mit Ginger Ale füllen.
PreparationIT: Versare 30gr di rum speziato in un bicchiere highball con ghiaccio.  Riempi con Ginger Ale.
Ingredients: Ginger ale, 1 oz Spiced rum

Preparation: Cut the half lime in half again. Add the lime, falernum, and bitters to a rocks glass. Muddle. Add the rum. (Aged Barbados rum such as Plantation 5 Year is recommended). Add ice and stir. Float the blackstrap rum on top. Serve with a straw.
PreparationDE: Die halbe Limette wieder in zwei Hälften schneiden. Füge Limette, Falernum und Bitter in ein Rocks Glas. Mischen. Den Rum hinzufügen. (Gereifter Barbados-Rum wie z.B. Plantation 5 Year wird empfohlen). Eis hinzufügen und umrühren. Blackstrap Rum dazugeben. Mit einem Strohhalm servieren.
PreparationIT: Taglia a metà il lime.  Aggiungere il lime, il falernum e il bitter in un bicchiere.  Aggiungi il rum.  (Si consigliano rum Barbados invecchiato come Plantation 5 Year).  Aggiungi il ghiaccio e mescola.  Versa il rum blackstrap sopra.  Servire con una cannuccia.
Ingredients: 1 oz Blackstrap Rum, 1 oz Añejo Rum, 2 dashes Angostura Bitters, 1/3 oz Falernum, 1/2 Lime

Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis schütteln, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 1/2 tsp Maraschino liqueur, 1/2 tsp Lime juice, 1/2 tsp Triple sec, 2 oz Light rum

Preparation: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.
PreparationDE: Zutaten zur Emulsion mischen, Eis hinzufügen, schütteln und direkt servieren.
PreparationIT: Aggiungere il gin, l'albume, il succo di limone e lo sciroppo di lamponi in uno shaker con ghiaccio e agitare energicamente fino a quando non si saranno raffreddati bene.    Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata.
Ingredients: 1 Egg white, Juice of 1/2 Lemon, 2 tsp Grenadine, 1/2 oz Gin

Preparation: Pour half of coke in a glass. Then add Bacardi and top it off with the remaining coke. Stir and drink up!
PreparationDE: Die Hälfte der Cola in ein Glas gießen. Dann Bacardi hinzufügen und mit dem verbleibenden Cola auffüllen. Rühren und trinken!
PreparationIT: Versare metà della coca cola in un bicchiere.  Quindi aggiungere il Bacardi e completare con la coca cola rimanente.  Mescola e bevi!
Ingredients: 2 parts Coca-Cola, 1 part Bacardi Limon

Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser) mit Eis schütteln und über zwei Eiswürfel in ein Highball-Glas seihen. Mit kohlensäurehaltigem Wasser auffüllen, umrühren und servieren.
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti (eccetto l'acqua gassata) con ghiaccio e filtrare in un bicchiere highball su due cubetti di ghiaccio. Riempi con acqua gassata, mescola e servi
Ingredients: Carbonated water, 1 Egg white, 1 tsp Powdered sugar, Juice of 1/2 Lemon, 1 oz Port, 1 oz Light rum

Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti.Agitare bene.Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail.
Ingredients: 1 tblsp Lemon juice, 1/2 oz Triple sec, 2 oz Brandy

Preparation: Boil water and sugar until dissolved. Turn off heat. Slowly add dry instant coffee and continue stirring. Add a chopped vanilla bean to the vodka, then combine the cooled sugar syrup and coffee solution with the vodka. Cover tightly and shake vigorously each day for 3 weeks. Strain and filter. Its also best to let the sugar mixture cool completely so the vodka won't evaporate when its added. If you like a smoother feel to the liqueur you can add about 1 teaspoon of glycerine to the finished product.
PreparationDE: Wasser und Zucker kochen, bis sie gelöst sind. Schalten Sie die Heizung aus. Geben Sie langsam trockenen Instantkaffee hinzu und rühren Sie weiter. Dem Wodka eine gehackte Vanilleschote hinzufügen, dann den gekühlten Zuckersirup und die Kaffeelösung mit dem Wodka vermengen. Täglich 3 Wochen lang fest abdecken und kräftig schütteln. Abseihen und filtern. Am besten ist es auch, die Zuckermischung vollständig abkühlen zu lassen, damit der Wodka nicht verdunstet, wenn er hinzugefügt wird. Wenn Sie einen weicheren Geschmack für den Likör mögen, können Sie dem Endprodukt etwa 1 Teelöffel Glyzerin hinzufügen.
PreparationIT: Far bollire l'acqua e lo zucchero fino a quando non saranno sciolti.  Spegni il fuoco.  Aggiungere lentamente il caffè istantaneo secco e continuare a mescolare.  Aggiungere un baccello di vaniglia tritato alla vodka, quindi unire lo sciroppo di zucchero raffreddato e la soluzione di caffè con la vodka.  Coprire bene e agitare vigorosamente ogni giorno per 3 settimane.  Filtrare e filtrare.  È anche meglio lasciare raffreddare completamente la miscela di zucchero in modo che la vodka non evapori quando viene aggiunta.  Se ti piace una sensazione più liscia al liquore puoi aggiungere circa 1 cucchiaino di glicerina al prodotto finito.
Ingredients: Caramel coloring, 1/2 cup Vodka, 1/2 Vanilla, 1/2 cup Instant Coffee, 2 cups White Sugar, 2 cups Water

Preparation: Same as Caipirinha but instead of cachaca you add WHITE RUM. It's great!!!!!!!!
PreparationDE: Wie Caipirinha, aber anstelle von Cachaca fügen Sie WHITE RUM hinzu. Es ist großartig!!!!!!!!
PreparationIT: Come la Caipirinha ma al posto della cachaca aggiungi del rum bianco.  È ottimo!
Ingredients: Crushed Ice, 2-3 oz White rum, 2 tblsp Sugar, 2 Lime

Preparation: Use a 15 oz glass. Add Campari first. Fill with beer.
PreparationDE: Verwenden Sie ein 15 oz Glas. Zuerst Campari hinzufügen. Mit Bier auffüllen.
PreparationIT: Usa un bicchiere da 450ml.  Aggiungi prima Campari.  Riempi di birra.
Ingredients: 1/2 cl Campari, 1 bottle Lager

Preparation: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den mit Eis gefüllten Cocktailshaker geben. Gut schütteln und doppelt in ein großes Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit Limettenrad garnieren.
PreparationIT: Aggiungi tutti gli ingredienti in uno shaker pieno di ghiaccio.  Shakerare bene e filtrare due volte in una grande coppetta da cocktail.  Guarnire con una fetta di lime.
Ingredients: 1/4 cup Cranberry juice, 1/4 oz Cointreau, 1/4 oz Lime juice, 1/4 oz Absolut Citron

Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.
PreparationDE: In einem Shaker, der halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, alle Zutaten vermengen. Gut schütteln. In ein Sour Glas abseihen.
PreparationIT: In uno shaker riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire tutti gli ingredienti. Filtrare in un bicchiere. Agitare bene.
Ingredients: 1 Egg yolk, 1 dash Orange bitters, 1 tsp Maraschino liqueur, 1/2 oz Lemon juice, 2 oz Gin

Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten mit Eis verrühren, in ein Cocktailglas abseihen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti con ghiaccio, filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail e servire.
Ingredients: 1/2 oz Muscatel Wine, 1/2 oz Sloe gin, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth

Preparation: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.
PreparationDE: Kaffee, Zucker und Wasser mischen. 1 Stunde köcheln lassen und abkühlen lassen. Füge Vanille und Wodka hinzu. Im verschlossenen Glas 2 bis 3 Wochen reifen lassen.
PreparationIT: Unisci caffè, zucchero e acqua. Fate bollire 1 ora e lasciate raffreddare. Aggiungi la vaniglia e la vodka. Invecchiare in un barattolo sigillato da 2 a 3 settimane.
Ingredients: 1/2 cups Water, 1 qt Vodka, 1/2 cups Sugar, 4 tblsp Vanilla extract, 10 tblsp Instant Coffee

Preparation: Put the milk in the bottom, pour the Liquer on top and add the dash of amaretto. Do not mix. SLAM IT!
PreparationDE: Die Milch auf den Boden geben, den Likör darüber gießen und den Spritzer Amaretto hinzufügen. Nicht mischen. SLAM IT!
PreparationIT: Mettere sul fondo il latte, versarvi sopra il liquore e unire la spruzzata di amaretto.  Non mescolare.
Ingredients: 1 dash Amaretto, 1/2 shot Milk, 1/2 shot Chocolate liqueur

Preparation: Take a glass, pour the Coke in the glass, then you take 7 drops of lemon juice. Granish with a lemon slice on the rim of the glass.
PreparationDE: Nimm ein Glas, gieße die Cola in das Glas, dann nimmst du 7 Tropfen Zitronensaft. Mit einer Zitronenscheibe am Rand des Glases garnieren.
PreparationIT: Prendi un bicchiere, versa la Coca-Cola nel bicchiere, quindi prendi 7 gocce di succo di limone.  Guarnire con una fetta di limone sul bordo del bicchiere
Ingredients: 7 drops Lemon juice, 1 dl Coca-Cola

Preparation: Shake, strain, straight up, cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe
PreparationDE: Schütteln, abseihen, aufrichten, Cocktailglas mit Absinth gespült.
PreparationIT: Agitare, filtrare, sciacquare il bicchiere da cocktail con assenzio e versare il mix fatto in precedenza.
Ingredients: 1 dash Absinthe, 3/4 oz Lemon Juice, 3/4 oz Lillet Blanc, 3/4 oz Triple Sec, 3/4 oz Gin

Preparation: Melt the bar in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently (with a whisk, i would assume) until heated well. Don't let it boil! Serve in coffee mug.
PreparationDE: Schmelzen Sie den Riegel in einer kleinen Menge kochendem Wasser. Milch zugeben. Bei schwacher Hitze kochen und dabei sanft (mit einem Schneebesen) aufschlagen, bis es gut erhitzt ist. Nicht aufkochen! In einer Kaffeetasse servieren.
PreparationIT: Sciogliere la barretta in una piccola quantità di acqua bollente. Aggiungi il latte. Cuocere a fuoco basso, montando delicatamente con una frusta fino a quando non sarà ben riscaldato.Non farlo bollire! Servire in tazza da caffè.
Ingredients: Water, 3/4 L Milk, 125 gr Chocolate

Preparation: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.
PreparationDE: Zucker und Wasser zum Kochen bringen und 10 Minuten köcheln lassen. Abkühlen. Die restlichen Zutaten zugeben und umrühren. Zugedeckt 1 Monat reifen lassen.
PreparationIT: Portare a ebollizione lo zucchero e l'acqua e cuocere a fuoco lento per 10 minuti.  Raffreddare..  Aggiungere gli altri ingredienti e mescolare.  Coprite e lasciate maturare per 1 mese.
Ingredients: 1 tblsp Green Food Coloring, 1 oz Pure Peppermint extract, 1 pint Grain alcohol, 6 cups Water, 8 cups Sugar

Preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten in ein Mischglas mit Eis geben. Rühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit einem Zweig frischer Minze im Getränk garnieren.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un mixing glass con ghiaccio. Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Agitare. Guarnire con un rametto di menta fresca nella bevanda.
Ingredients: 2 Fresh leaves Mint, 2 dashes Peach Bitters, 6 cl Gin

Preparation: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour sholud be very dark approaching the colour of Guiness.
PreparationDE: Zuerst das Lagerbier gießen und dann die schwarze Johannisbeere hinzufügen. Mit dem Apfelmost auffüllen. Die Farbe sollte sehr dunkel sein und sich der Farbe von Guiness nähern.
PreparationIT: Versare prima la birra chiara e poi lo sciroppo di ribes nero.  Rabboccare il sidro.  Il colore dovrebbe essere molto scuro, avvicinandosi al colore della Guinness.
Ingredients: 1 dash Blackcurrant cordial, 1/2 pint Cider, 1/2 pint Lager

Preparation: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled cocktail glass.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten in den Shaker mit Eiswürfel geben. Gut schütteln. In einem gekühlten Cocktailglas abseihen.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nello shaker con cubetti di ghiaccio.Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail ghiacciata. Agitare bene
Ingredients: 1 tsp Powdered sugar, Juice of 1/2 Lime, 1/2 oz Light rum

Preparation: pour it in and mix it.
PreparationIT: Versare tutti gli ingredienti in un bicchiere, mescola bene.
Ingredients: 1 part Everclear, 3 parts Coffee

Preparation: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and ginger ale. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.
PreparationDE: In einem Highball-Glas, das fast mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, den Gin mit dem Ginger Ale vermengen. Gut umrühren. Mit dem Limettenkeil garnieren.
PreparationIT: In un bicchiere highball quasi riempito con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire il gin e la ginger ale. Mescolare bene. Guarnire con lo spicchio di lime.
Ingredients: 1 Lime, 4 oz Ginger ale, 1/2 oz Gin

Preparation: Start with the Sprite. Next comes the tequila. After that, add the Minute Maid Fruit Punch, then float the 151. Rocks optional.
PreparationDE: Beginne mit dem Sprite. Als nächstes kommt der Tequila. Danach geben Sie die Minute Maid Fruit Punch hinzu, dann schwenken Sie die 151. Rocks optional.
PreparationIT: Inizia con la Sprite.  Poi versa la tequila.  Dopodiché, aggiungi il Minute Maid Fruit Punch, infine versare il 151.  Ghiaccio opzionale.
Ingredients: 1 float Bacardi 151 proof rum, 2 shots Tequila, 1 part Sprite, 2 part Fruit punch

Preparation: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
PreparationDE: In einem Mischglas, das halb mit Eiswürfeln gefüllt ist, den Scotch mit Wermut kombinieren. Gut umrühren. In ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Mit der Zitronenscheibe garnieren.
PreparationIT: In un mixing glass riempito a metà con cubetti di ghiaccio, unire lo scotch e il vermouth.Filtrare in un bicchiere da cocktail. Mescolare bene. Guarnire con la scorza di limone
Ingredients: 1 twist Lemon peel, 1/2 tsp Dry Vermouth, 1/2 oz Scotch

Preparation: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.
PreparationIT: Dritto: Versare tutti gli ingredienti nel mixing glass con cubetti di ghiaccio. Mescolare bene. Filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail Martini ghiacciata. Spremi l'olio della scorza di limone sulla bevanda o guarnisci con l'oliva.
Ingredients: 1 Olive, 1/3 oz Dry Vermouth,2/3 oz Gin

Preparation: This is a layered shot - the Bailey's must be on top
PreparationDE: Dies ist ein mehrschichtiger Schnaps - der Bailey's muss oben sein.
PreparationIT: Questo è uno shot a strati, il Bailey deve essere versato per ultimo.
Ingredients: Baileys irish cream, Sambuca, Kahlua

Preparation: Pour the vodka, dry vermouth and olive brine into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice and shake well.  Rub the rim of a martini glass with the wedge of lemon.  Strain the contents of the cocktail shaker into the glass and add the olive.  A dirty Martini contains a splash of olive brine or olive juice and is typically garnished with an olive.
PreparationDE: Wodka, trockenen Wermut und Olivensole in einen Cocktailshaker mit einer Handvoll Eis geben und gut schütteln.
PreparationIT: Versare la vodka, il vermouth secco e la salamoia in uno shaker con una manciata di ghiaccio e agitare bene.  Strofina il bordo di un bicchiere da martini con la fetta di limone.  Filtrare il contenuto dello shaker nel bicchiere e aggiungere l'oliva.  Un Martini sporco contiene una spruzzata di salamoia o succo di oliva ed è tipicamente guarnito con un'oliva.
Ingredients: 1 Olive, 1 wedge Lemon, 2 tbsp Olive Brine, 1 tbsp Dry Vermouth, 70 ml Vodka

Preparation: There are many good cherry liqueurs you can use, but I prefere Heering. Add one share of the liqueur. Then you add one share of Soda. For a sour sling use Tonic (most people prefer the drink without Tonic). Afterwards you fill the glass with Orange Juice and ice cubes.
PreparationDE: Es gibt viele gute Kirschliköre, die Sie verwenden können, aber ich bevorzuge Heering. Eine Portion des Likörs nehmen. Dann fügen Sie eine Portion Soda hinzu. Für eine saure Note verwenden Sie Tonic (die meisten Menschen bevorzugen das Getränk ohne Tonic). Danach füllen Sie das Glas mit Orangensaft und Eiswürfeln.
PreparationIT: Ci sono molti buoni liquori alla ciliegia che puoi usare, ma preferisco Heering.  Aggiungi una parte del liquore.  Quindi aggiungi una parte di acqua di seltz.  Per un drink più acido ( sour )  usa il tonico (la maggior parte delle persone preferisce la bevanda senza tonico).  Successivamente si riempie il bicchiere con succo d'arancia e cubetti di ghiaccio.
Ingredients: Ice, 1 part Orange juice, 1 part Soda water, 1 part Cherry Heering

Preparation: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass.  Fill the glass with ice cubes.  Pour the cachaca into the glass.  Stir well.
PreparationDE: Den Zucker in einem old-fashioned Glas in die Limettenspalten mischen.
PreparationIT: Pestare lo zucchero con gli spicchi di lime in un bicchiere vecchio stile, riempire il bicchiere con cubetti di ghiaccio, versare la cachaca nel bicchiere e mescolare bene.
Ingredients: 1/2 oz Cachaca, 1 Lime, 2 tsp Demerara Sugar

Preparation: Shake all ingredients.  Double strain in a chilled double old fashioned glass with abig ice cube.  Garnish with a couple of lavender sprigs
PreparationIT: Shakerare tutti gli ingredienti.  Doppia filtrazione in un doppio bicchiere vecchio stile freddo con un grande cubo di ghiaccio.  Guarnire con un paio di rametti di lavanda
Ingredients: 2 sprigs Lavender, Pinch Pepper, 2 Dashes Angostura Bitters, 1.5 cl St. Germain, 2.5 cl Pineapple Syrup, 2.5 cl Lime Juice, 5 cl Pisco

Preparation: In a highball glass filled with ice add 6cl dark rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.
PreparationDE: In einem mit Eis gefüllten Highball-Glas 6 cl dunklen Rum hinzufügen und mit Ingwerbier auffüllen. Mit Limettenkeil garnieren.
PreparationIT: In un bicchiere highball pieno di ghiaccio aggiungere 6 cl di rum scuro e guarnire con ginger beer.  Guarnire con uno spicchio di lime.
Ingredients: 10 cl Ginger Beer, 5 cl Dark Rum

Preparation: Pour into shot glass. Put in mouth. Repeat as deemed necessary.
PreparationDE: In das Schnapsglas gießen. In den Mund nehmen. Bei Bedarf wiederholen.
PreparationIT: Versare nel bicchiere da shot.  Versa in bocca.
Ingredients: 0.25 oz Hot Damn, 0.75 oz Whiskey

Preparation: Stir all ingredients (except lemon peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.
PreparationDE: Alle Zutaten (außer Zitronenschale) mit Eis verrühren und in ein Cocktailglas abseihen. Die Zitronenschale hinzufügen und servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare tutti gli ingredienti (tranne la buccia di limone) con ghiaccio e filtrare in una coppetta da cocktail. Aggiungere la scorza di limone e servire.
Ingredients: 1 Twist Lemon peel, 1 dash Bitters, 3/4 oz Gin, 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge

Preparation: Heat the cream and milk with the cinnamon and vanilla bean very slowly for 15-20 minutes. (If you don't have any beans add 1-2 tsp of vanilla after heating). Remove the bean and cinnamon. Add the chocolate. Mix until fully melted. Serve topped with some very dense fresh whipped cream. Serves 1-2 depending upon how much of a glutton you are. For a richer chocolate, use 4 oz of milk, 4 oz of cream, 4 oz of chocolate. Serve in coffee mug.
PreparationDE: Sahne und Milch mit Zimt und Vanilleschote sehr langsam für 15-20 Minuten erhitzen. (Wenn Sie keine Schoten haben, geben Sie nach dem Erhitzen 1-2 Teelöffel Vanillearoma dazu). Bohnen und Zimt entfernen. Fügen Sie die Schokolade hinzu. Mischen, bis sie vollständig geschmolzen sind. Mit sehr dicker, frischer Schlagsahne servieren. Für 1-2 Personen. Für eine reichhaltigere Schokolade verwenden Sie 4 oz Milch, 4 oz Sahne, 4 oz Schokolade. In einer Kaffeetasse servieren.
PreparationIT: Riscaldare la panna e il latte con la cannella e il baccello di vaniglia molto lentamente per 15-20 minuti.  (Se non hai i baccelli, aggiungi 1-2 cucchiaini di aroma di vaniglia dopo il riscaldamento).  Rimuovere i fagioli e la cannella.  Aggiungi il cioccolato.  Mescolare fino a completo scioglimento.  Servire con panna montata fresca e molto densa.  Per 1-2 persone.  Per un cioccolato più ricco, usa 120 ml di latte, 120 ml di panna e 100 ml di cioccolato.  Servire in una tazza da caffè.
Ingredients: Fresh Whipped cream, 2 oz Finely chopped dark Chocolate, 1 Vanilla, 1 stick Cinnamon, 6-8 oz Milk, 2 oz Heavy cream

Preparation: Easy as you like, pour the absinthe into a chilled glass, top with champagne. Must be drunk mid afternoon for the optimum effect.
PreparationIT: Versa l'assenzio in un bicchiere ghiacciato e aggiungi dello champagne.
Ingredients: 1 top Champagne, 2 shots Absinthe

Preparation: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add soda water, serve with a straw.
PreparationDE: Sirup und Milch in einem Fontänenglas mischen. Mit Sodawasser aufgießen und mit einem Strohhalm servieren.
PreparationIT: Mescolare lo sciroppo e il latte in un bicchiere da fontana. Aggiungere la soda water, servire con una cannuccia.
Ingredients: 6 oz Soda water, 6 oz Milk, 2 tblsp Chocolate syrup
